2325.title: MissileFrigate.sit
2325.author: Anonymous
2325.description:
Small plug-in that adds one purchasable ship, the UE Missile Frigate, a modification of the standard UE Destroyer that makes better use of hunter missiles and adds a little diversity to the UE line-up.  Also adds one person whom you should all recognize, and makes EVO's greatest challenge even more challenging.
By astro.

2319.title: LightningJump.sit
2319.author: Anonymous
2319.description: For those of you who hate waiting for your ship to go to hyperspace, this plug-in is for you. The second you hit the jump button, youre in the next system!

2332.title: QuickJump
2332.author: Anonymous
2332.description: This is the latest verion of QuickJump, before there were some problems when using this plug with other plugs, this shouldnt happen now unless they share the same resource number . This plug simply adds an outfit that decreases the number of days required to make a hyperspace jump by a maximum of 10 and to a minimum of one.

2392.title: TradingPost1.0
2392.author: Anonymous
2392.description: Trading Post 1.0 tell you all about those obscure things like hubcaps, lucky charms, crassworms and such. Where to go, how much you'll make, a commentary on each one, and maps for some.  It's Trade Secrets with a makeover.  --KOPD

2801.title: TheDocks103
2801.author: Anonymous
2801.description: The Docks, the new ship editor for EVO. Enables TOTAL editing of ships in EVO, including easy access to flags and the new features added in EVO 1.0.2. Allows the creation of floating ID lists for Weapons, Outfits and Governments. Edit Sprites, other images, descriptions, names and parameters. The Docks auto calculates sprite sizes. Load pictures normally or from a resource file containing PICT resources (like another plug in). Very clean interface, tabable fields, balloon help. A lovely program to use. Download this for all your ship editing needs. Written by Kane O'Donnell.

2792.title: ResEdit213.sit
2792.author: Anonymous
2792.description:
Apples powerful yet free resource editor, is the most essential
   tool you need to edit and/or build EV Override plug-ins.

2378.title: EVOMissionMap
2378.author: Anonymous
2378.description: This is a complete map of Overrides missions and the relationships between them, in the form of a huge GIF image (3838 x 2164 pixels, although the file is only 123K since its BW with some large blank areas). Explanation of the map symbols is in the lower right corner.

2299.title: EVODominator.sit
2299.author: Anonymous
2299.description: Heres a little plug-in that I put together to make dominating planets less tedious. I prefer short, violent battles to long tedious ones, so I changed the defense fleet params for all of the worlds to send a single wave of 38 ships at once! If you want one gloriously big, brief, battle, with maximum violence, this is the plug-in for you!

2371.title: ChroniclesByJake101.sit
2371.author: Anonymous
2371.description: Chronicles by Jake101 is a collection of the stories by Jake101. All his work has been edited to a common format and spell checked, hopefully making some things clearer. It also includes a number of chapters that haven't yet been released on the chronicles: chapter two of UE Fighter, and chapters 10 and 11 of Jade's Return. By Talos of Bacchus Freeware.

2534.title: FrozenHeart104.sit
2534.author: Anonymous
2534.description: Written as one of the most ambitious plug-ins for Escape Velocity or Override to date, and set in a totally new, totally coherent science-fiction universe, the Frozen Heart was 14 months in development and features all new ships, systems, planets, governments, outfits, missions and weapons, plus a slew of QuickTime movie footage. Sharp, stylish writing and crisp, detailed all new graphics, plus many previously unencountered features combine with a tautly constructed plot to provide a level of game-play which is simply one step beyond.

2376.title: EVOBible.sit
2376.author: Anonymous
2376.description: This is the EVO 1.0.2 Bible broken up into SimpleText documents. I find it easier than scrolling through the whole thing looking for a particular section. Hopefully someone will get some use out of it.

2521.title: FemmeFatale.sea
2521.author: Anonymous
2521.description:
Jasta Hela - briefly encountered in the hugely popular Frozen Heart for Escape Velocity Override - is back with her own adventure. Discovered helpless and drifting in a human death-trap, Jasta Hela recovers only to learn that sinister forces have wiped her memories clean. Out there - in the galactic heart and on the galactic rim - lie the answers to her true identity. Along with swift death for the unwary.
Pre-reviewed by critical players as better than Frozen Heart, Femme Fatale is the first plug-in to feature a female lead, introduces new twists on the EVO engine, introduces new hazards, new outfits, new ships, new enemies, has a deeply sinister sound-track, AND, its a thumping good game.

2386.title: OverrideBible102
2386.author: Anonymous
2386.description: An excellent PDF version of the Override Bible for plug-developers.  This version is fully bookmarked and has the changes from 1.0.1 to 1.0.2 highlighted.  Highly recommended for plug-in developers easy to read, print out, and search through.

2377.title: EVOCompleteMap
2377.author: Anonymous
2377.description: EVO Complete Map is a map of the entire EVO universe and details possible changes in the universe (such as the freeing of Huron).

2373.title: EVO 3D Designs.sea
2373.author: Anonymous
2373.description: Peter Cartwright and Ambrosia Software, Inc. have worked together to bring you almost all the original 3D designs used to create the graphics for EV: Override. This includes the models for planets, stations, ships, weapons, outfit items, and so on. They are all Infini-D format, because that's what was used to make them. If anyone knows how to, and cares to take the time to, convert them to another format (even assuming that's necessary, I'm not familiar with many 3D packages), they are free to distribute them in that format, as long as it is distributed as a complete package with this documentation.

2380.title: EVOOutfitsGuide.sit
2380.author: Anonymous
2380.description: Do you know which weapons and outfits are best for you? Do you need a guide to help you decide whats worth buying and whats worth leaving on the shelf? Heres the guide that can help you do that. This version includes corrections, plus new data to bring it up to date with EVO 1.0.2.

2381.title: EVOPoliticalMap04
2381.author: Anonymous
2381.description: This Adobe Acrobat file contains a beta version of a map of the galaxy at the start of the game.

2749.title: Crillee.sit
2749.author: Anonymous
2749.description: This typeface (at 6 point and without anti-aliasing) was used to create the text for the EV Override target displays.

2758.title: evobae
2758.author: Anonymous
2758.description: This special EVO Bible not only gives you all the info you need to get started making your very own plug, but also provides new helpful comments that will make getting started an even easier process!

2768.title: govteditor
2768.author: Anonymous
2768.description:
ResEdit Plugin EVO gövt resource editor v1.0.0  
The gövt editor brings up a custom dialog for gövt resources
in ResEdit, including check boxes for all those endless flag
and jamming options! (No more hex calculations! Yay!) This
editor is  about 11kb in size. You just paste the contents
of the resource file into your ResEdit 2.1.3 preferences
file and then you can start editing govts just like builtin
ResEdit resources. It will work on any system that ResEdit
can run on. There are instructions with the editor and you
are expected to read them carefully!

2796.title: shipwrite116
2796.author: Anonymous
2796.description:
ShipWrite

What is it? -----------

Shipwrite is a tool for viewing, editing and creating ships
for plugins to use in the great game Escape Velocity
Override (EVO for short) by Matt Burch and the people at
Ambrosia Software Inc.  This is not official software and we
are not associated with Ambrosia in anyway except as
satisfied customers.


What does it do? ----------------

Creating a complete ship for EVO requires up to 14 separate
resources to be created, all with specific numbering
conventions. Shipwrite makes it easy, all you have to know
is a single ship ID number and ShipWrite takes care of the
rest.

Website  ----------------

http://www.sutherland-studios.com.au/family/evo_software.html

Enjoy!

Ralph and Rodger Nov 2000

2798.title: shipwrite118
2798.author: Anonymous
2798.description:
ShipWrite 1.1.8,  Dec. 2000.
Shipwrite is a tool for viewing, editing and creating ships
for plugins to use in EVO. Creating a complete ship for EVO
requires up to 14 separate resources to be created, all with
specific numbering conventions. Shipwrite makes it easy, all
you have to know is a single ship ID number and ShipWrite
takes care of the rest. Changes for 1.1.8 : Fixes Ship Delete Bug.
Contact Email: Ralph.Sutherland@anu.edu.au.

2753.title: EV Text 10
2753.author: Anonymous
2753.description: A tool that can export text from EV/EVO plug-ins to a text file, for simple spellchecking, and then take that text and put it back into your plug-in.

2344.title: SuperCrescentWarship1.0.sea
2344.author: Anonymous
2344.description: This plug makes the Crescent Warship as perfect as possible.

2757.title: evo-templates.sit
2757.author: Anonymous
2757.description: Paste these templates into an EVO Res Edit Resource file to be able to change values in your EVO plugs.

2382.title: EVOShipGuide101.cpt
2382.author: Anonymous
2382.description: Which is better? The UE cruiser? The Igazra? Or perhaps even the Voinian Cruiser? This and many other questions are not answered, but this guide gives you all the numbers and analysis to help you figure out for yourself whats the best ship for you. This version includes corrections, plus new data to pull it in line with the changes in EVO 1.0.1.

2330.title: Phase beam plug.sit
2330.author: Anonymous
2330.description: This plug converts phase beams ammo from fuel to a rechargeable power cell, also allows you to sell back the phase beam if you still don't like them. Also fixes the phase beam bug in EVO 1.0.1.

2762.title: EVOGod.sea
2762.author: Anonymous
2762.description: Latest update to the newest full-blown EVO editor. This time the Govts/Dudes really do save! Other minor bug fixes. Now that version .7 has finally settled down I can start making the Stellar/Syst editor and the program will be finished soon. Don't forget to chuck out your old preferences file. Enjoy!

2389.title: TechFolder
2389.author: Anonymous
2389.description: Captain Canardley Ableson's Technical Guide to the EV/O Universe is a must have (I think) for all of you who seek a deeper understanding of this universe. Sort of like Star Wars's Technical Manual or Star Trek's Compendium, Captain Ableson tells you (among other things) about how blaze cannons fire, how Defence Pods run, and describes the secret of the hyperdrive. By ElGuapo7.

2391.title: TradeSecrets12
2391.author: Anonymous
2391.description: Ever wondered where to sell those hubcaps? Trade Secrets 1.1 tells you which planets (and systems) to go to for trading 'junk', as well as the price, profit, and distance you'll have to go. This version has the CORRECT price for Saalian Brandy. --KOPD

2797.title: shipwrite117
2797.author: Anonymous
2797.description:
ShipWrite 1.1.7 Update

Adds some new features to v1.1.6

What is it?
Shipwrite is a tool for viewing, editing and creating ships
for plugins to use in EVO 1.0.2.

What does it do?
Creating a complete ship for EVO requires up to 14 separate
resources to be created, all with specific numbering
conventions. Shipwrite makes it easy, all you have to know
is a single ship ID number and ShipWrite takes care of the
rest.

2754.title: EVEdit321.sit
2754.author: Anonymous
2754.description:
EV-Edit is a scenario editor for Ambroisas Escape Velocity and EV
   Override. EV-Edit takes advantage of Escape Velocitys incredible
   flexibility by allowing anyone to create their own
   scenario.

2350.title: UEBattleship1.1
2350.author: Anonymous
2350.description: UE Battleship is for those people that don't like to watch the UE Fleet get blown to crap by the Voinian Dreadnought and similair ships. It adds one ship, the UE Battleship, and one new Person. Enjoy!

2281.title: Bbp sit
2281.author: Anonymous
2281.description: A set of simple plugins for EV:Override by Brian Reinacher.  The files are: UE Cloak Enhancer, Phased Beam Fixer, Zidagar Booster, and Cheater Beam.  Everybody should find something they can use.

2285.title: CloakKeep3.sit
2285.author: Anonymous
2285.description: This plugin lets you keep the cloaking device when you trade ships. It also lets you buy it back if you have already traded ships.

2348.title: The Return of BBP.sit
2348.author: Anonymous
2348.description: This is a set of cheat and utility plugs I developed a few years ago. It includes Cheater Beam, a million credit misson, a Crecent Weapon Enhancer, an outfit that reduces jump time to one day, and others. Keep what you want and ditch the rest.

2356.title: VectorWarshipPlug.sea
2356.author: Anonymous
2356.description: Ever get that feeling that a souped-up EV:O Crescent Warship just doesn19t kick as much ass as an EV Kestrel did? Let the Vector Warship be your answer. This plug primarily increases all capacities of the Crescent Warship to a reasonable degree, making the ship more agile, customizable and enabling it19s Captain to last much longer in a prolonged fire fight. This plug also makes the cloaking device available on Earth (at a bargain price of 100K), and will keep it with you when upgrading to another ship.

2374.title: EVO FAQ
2374.author: Anonymous
2374.description: I decided to make a guide for Escape Velocity: Override because no one else had one that said how to start the mission strings. This is my first submission to this site and my first guide. If you find any mistakes or things I should add please e-mail me at Bubba_Skunk@hotmail.com  Enjoy, Bubba_Skunk

2506.title: EVOSIPatch1.0
2506.author: Anonymous
2506.description: EVOSI Patch version 1.0 by Coraxus -This plug-in is just a minor patch that gives Miranu ships its own unique color (yellow) when it registers in your transponder readout system. A visual comm. image has been added for the Nadir. This patch is only to be used if you have EVOSI 1.0.0. Comments or questions: prefectural@yahoo.com

2569.title: lightningjump.sit
2569.author: Anonymous
2569.description:
Lightning Jump is a simple utility-type plug-in for either Escape Velocity or EV Override.  This small but useful goodie physically speeds up your hyperjumps so that you're in the next system by the time your finger lifts off the 'J' key.  This does not affect time in the game clock.

This package includes both the EV and EVO versions of the plug-in.

2675.title: StrangeAsteroid.sit
2675.author: Anonymous
2675.description: This mission replaces the placeholder graphics for the Strange Asteroid in the Miranu/Igadzra mission sequences to make the mission, as EV Override designer Peter Cartwright put it, "make sense at last (or at least...make as little sense as it was meant to make)."

2765.title: EVOTemplatesWithIcons
2765.author: Anonymous
2765.description:
The EV Override Annotated Templates is a set of Resorcerer
   templates for developing EV Override plug-ins. It includes all the
   information from the EVO Bible embedded within the template,
   eliminating the need to switch back and forth between Acrobat
   Reader and Resorcerer. It also takes advantage of Resorcerers
   advanced template features

2771.title: MC100Classic.sit
2771.author: Anonymous
2771.description:
MissionComputer for EV Override 1.0.0, Classic Version
MissionComputer is a new mission editor for EV Override. It does not replace traditional plug-in editing tools such as ResEdit, but complements them to provide an easier way of editing missions, descriptions, commodities, and the game's year offset. It also provides an easier way to look up the resource IDs needed when setting up plug-ins. This version of MissionComputer supports Mac OS 8.x and 9.x (not tested with System 7.x) on PowerPC- and 68000 series-based Macintosh computers. Windows-based Macintosh emulators may be able to run this version, but no guarantees are made.

2772.title: MissionComputer9-140
2772.author: Anonymous
2772.description: By David Arthur. A scenario editor for Escape Velocity and EV Override which can edit the desc, dude, flet, govt, junk, misn, pers, and year resources. (Classic Edition)

2777.title: outfeditor
2777.author: Anonymous
2777.description:
ResEdit Plugin EVO oütf resource editor v1.0.1  
The oütf editor brings up a custom dialog for oütf resources
in ResEdit, including associated PICTs and Strings if they
are in the same file. This editor is  about 11kb in size.
You just paste the contents of the resource file into your
ResEdit 2.1.3 preferences file and then you can start
editing oütfs just like builtin ResEdit resources. It will
work on any system that ResEdit can run on. There are
instructions with the editor and you are expected to read
them carefully!

2778.title: Override102Templates
2778.author: Anonymous
2778.description: These ResEdit templates incorporate the latest features of EVO 1.0.2. Notable updates have been made to the shïp, spöb, and sÿst resources, allowing more powerful manipulation of the EVO universe. NOTE: This template file comes directly from the EVO 1.0.2 update and is not altered, manipulated, or annotated in any way. This download contains only ResEdit templates.

2783.title: PilotConverter2.sit
2783.author: Anonymous
2783.description: Pilot Converter reads pilot files from the original Escape Velocity or Escape Velocity: Override and converts the data to Escape Velocity: Nova pilot files. Now you don't need to make a new pilot if you want to keep playing in the original EV universes using one of the EVC (Escape Velocity Classic) or EVO plugins made for use with Nova.

2763.title: EVOPlugaid
2763.author: Anonymous
2763.description: EVO Plug aid will help you sort out all your plugins, graphics, movies and even provides aliases to folders you might use such as EVO itself, EVedit/resedit, the evo folder or the plugins folder. It provides different types of stroage for different types of plugin (single, set, homemade, downloaded or backup) and also for graphics.(planets, weapons, ships[with sub categorys] and movies). This utility also provides the EVO bible. Most icons that arn't straight from evo are custom. I doubt I will make another one of theese, but here you go anyhow.   fistoprince@yahoo.co.uk   .fistoprince.

2723.title: ultimate armory 1
2723.author: Anonymous
2723.description:
Tired of not having enough room on-board to get enough weapons.  well I mad this plug-in just for that.  I made everything weigh less cost less and so that you can have more of them than usual and I made it so you can buy anything just about anywhere!  Just go to sol or any other main faction solar system to buy any weapon.

If you have any questions email me at sean-1@comcast.net

2648.title: seans wacky world
2648.author: Anonymous
2648.description:
This is my second add-on its pretty crazy have fun with it!!!!
Send questions or comments to Sean-1@comcast.net

2671.title: StarWars2103.sit
2671.author: Anonymous
2671.description: This is a port of the EV scenario Star Wars 2.01 to EV Override.

2414.title: B5Plug-inforEVOv2.6.sea
2414.author: Anonymous
2414.description: Babylon 5 plug-in version 2.6. Graphics all rendered in 3d including sprites, tactical displays and shipyard, including new ships. over 200 systems, almost 100 missions, over 40 ships, over 50 oufits and around 30 sounds. This plug-in starts off somewhere during the year 2259, but by the time you accumulate enough money and combat rating to take on the core missions, it will correspond to the events at the beginning of 2260, or the third season of Babylon 5. This plug-in therefore contains spoilers for the show, in the form of missions, for episodes up to the end of the fourth season (fifth season events to be added in a future release)

2395.author: Anonymous
2395.description: it is a plug-in that makes all the governments in the original game go against each other and it has a cool begining story line. it is done by nate poindexter and edited matthew poindexter. its release date is november 6th 2001. it is version 2.0. it runs only with other plug-ins like (all included with the cheat) christo's evo cheater, dl-redirect 3.pl, ev-or cheater, person's of the evo webboard, quick ride, and supershipevo. the file is called 3.

2379.title: EVOOutfitsGuide.cpt
2379.author: Anonymous
2379.description: Do you know which weapons and outfits are best for you? Do you need a guide to help you decide whats worth buying and whats worth leaving on the shelf? Heres the guide that can help you do that. This version includes corrections, plus new data to pull it in line with the changes in EVO 1.0.1.

2495.title: EVOFacelift.sit
2495.author: Anonymous
2495.description: This plug-in is a back port of Tim Morgan's EVN-EVO Facelift, a plug-in for EV Nova. It is a graphical facelift for EVO, featuring awesome 3D ship and weapon sprites, redesigned high-quality explosion graphics, new smoke trails, and Nova-style sidebar  target pics. Plus it includes larger dialogs accommodating Nova-sized landing, shipyard, and outfit pics.

2559.title: Incomplete.sit
2559.author: Anonymous
2559.description: Incomplete is my aborted attempt at an Escape Velocity Override plug-in.  If it's not done,  you may ask, then why in the world am I uploading it?  Well, for two reasons: first, as a challenge to anyone who wants to try and complete it, and second as a source of new custom graphics and sounds for use by the EV community.  As long as you credit my work, you should feel free to rip the resources in this file to bits and use them in your own plug-ins.  They're just going to waste on my hard drive, so use them!  Thanks.  -UniversalWolf

2326.title: Money
2326.author: Anonymous
2326.description: Money is a simple cheat plug which allows you to land on any planet and pick up a mission where you take off and land for an easy 100 000 000 credits. It also changes the map outfit so that it shows the entire galaxy. A simple but effective plug which makes cheating a breeze.

2282.title: Buyafork
2282.author: Anonymous
2282.description: Buyafork lets you buy a froklift. It also lets you keep your cloaking device after you change ships made with EVO God.

2301.title: EVOmegaTaster
2301.author: Anonymous
2301.description: Cream your pants at the amazing graphics which you will discover in this taster for my upcoming plugin EVOmega. It adds two super-powerful ships with brand new graphics avaliable anywhere in the galaxy for free.

2667.title: Star Trek Preview.sit
2667.author: Anonymous
2667.description: This plug-in is a preview for a plug that could contain an entire Star Trek galaxy, if it's well received.  Adds the Galaxy, Sovereign, Miranda, Intrepid, and Defiant class starships as well as Phaser Banks, Arrays, Photon, and Quantum Torps.  Feedback is appreciated send to PGM@iglide.net or CIBikle@iglide.net.

2769.title: graphics up for grabs.sit
2769.author: Anonymous
2769.description: This is no plug in.  It is a bunch of pict resources which you'll need resedit to use.  I'm working on a plug called "A New Ally" and have finished all the graphics for it, so now I'm into all the boring, busywork part of making the plug.   Sometimes you get bored, and just have to do some graphics, you know?    So in a burst of creative energy, I modeled two ships, made sprties, target pics, shipyard pics, everything, which I have absolutely no use for.  Maybe you will. Please email me first.  Address provided in readme.

2421.title: Big Map.sit
2421.author: Anonymous
2421.description:
Big Map is a plug-in which makes the map screen for
Override bigger  It now has a huge 500x500 pixel viewing
area (that's up from 300x300). A simple plug-in, but useful
for those who get a feeling of claustrophobia when looking
at their tiny map or otherwise simply to see large amounts
of the universe at once.

2387.title: ResEdit Documentation.sit
2387.author: Anonymous
2387.description: As far as I know, there is and has been no reference or manual on the subject of using ResEdit for EVO plug-in development. Well, one seems to be here now, doesn't it? This is an Adobe Acrobat PDF file, fully bookmarked, making it useful for both a reference and a manual/tutorial. It gives an introduction to using ResEdit for EV/O plug-in development for the beginner, teaching them every skill they'll need to make a plug-in in ResEdit. This can be used for EV or EVO, though it was written with EVO in mind (A word of warning: don't attempt to use this for writing "real" macintosh programs. It covers plenty for plug-ins, but barely anything for Mac programming. If you attempt it, your computer will die and so will you, when you look upon the charred remnants of your Mac.). The documentation is actually titled "The Plug-in Developer's Guide to ResEdit", but I couldn't fit it in the file name. A copy of ResEdit is included with the documentation. If you have suggestions, questions, complaints, etc., email me at: alethiometer@earthlink.net

2433.title: ColdFusion1.0.0
2433.author: Anonymous
2433.description: Dreamwave Studios brings you Cold Fusion, the brand new graphics modification plug that brings Override to a new level (and MAGMA a new competitor). Features completely modified and retextured variants of the original ship models, 3/4 sprites, new planet graphics, professional landscapes, eye-popping explosion effects and more. Read all about it and check out a few previews at http://dreamwave.evula.net/plugins.html

2334.title: QuickRide.sit
2334.author: Anonymous
2334.description: This plug-in allows adds many new hyperspace paths making it quicker to get from lets say for instance south tip station to north tips station I made this plug-in with EV Edit.

2362.title: Zampaman.sit
2362.author: Anonymous
2362.description: Hello from Italy! I'm Zampaman(or Leo, if you want). I wrote this cheat for better enjoying my next plug-in, NewTech2. It is a pilotfile and with it you can have a billion credits!! Wonderful, isn't it? -)

2760.title: EVOFolders.sit
2760.author: Anonymous
2760.description:
If you have Mac OS 8, you have probably noticed the 3D look of the
   folders. And then you looked at the EV and EVO folders on your
   hard drive, and they looked flat as a pancake. So here are the
   EV/EVO OS8 Folder Upgrades, upgrades to the EV and EVO folders
   that give them the three dimensional look of Mac OS 8.

2303.title: EVOR Super
2303.author: Anonymous
2303.description: This Makes it so you can buy UE and Vonion Ships in the its gov. space.  Also you can get lots of money fast!  And if you ever wanted serios fighting to got it with all the UE and Vonion bays purchasable!

2385.title: Junk Secrets
2385.author: Anonymous
2385.description: This document gives you info on where "junk"(i.e. Tourists, Crassworms) are sold and bought in EV:Override. Also tells you when it's sold, if applicable.

2408.title: Any ship anywhere - EVO
2408.author: Anonymous
2408.description: This cheat allows you to buy any ship (including the ones you shouldn't get) from any shipyard in the EVO galaxy. Read the readme for more detailed stuff.

2575.title: magma201.sit
2575.author: Anonymous
2575.description: Meowx Design Studios' EVO : MAGMA is the critically acclaimed EVO plug in that now has over 5000 downloads.  MAGMA completely replaces the sounds and graphics from Escape Velocity Override with brand new, realistic ones. Not much is new in this, version 2.0.1 just tying up a few loose ends.  v2.0.1 will be MAGMA's final version.

2463.title: Empire for EVO
2463.author: Anonymous
2463.description: Empire: War Without End for EVO - This is a port of the classic EV plug-in Empire: War Without End to EVO. This was originally released in 1997 by Tim Isles and started the increasingly inaccurately named Empire Trilogy. In the process of converting the plug-in I have fixed a few things here and there so, with any luck, this will be better than the original. The plug-in has been merged with the underlying EV universe so it works as a TC plug-in for EVO. Enjoy!

2519.title: f25.sit
2519.author: Anonymous
2519.description: F-25: New Galaxy v1.4 -- It's been two months since you last ventured deep into the dark depths of the Proxima and Ji Nebulas. Two months since you heard news of colonization within these dark frontiers. Now, that silence has been broken. You are sitting in Station Pybin's hectic bar one day when a scientist catches your eye. He seems to have some connection to the Nebula exploration missions, and quickly, you are sweptup in his story. You soon discover that the only planet habitable to life in the turbulent Ji Nebula, F-25, was colonized. But something has gone wrong. Once you venture to the other side, you find yourself embroiled in a deadly struggle between the Bomaarii Confederation and the ruthless, conquering Kytarii Empire. Will you aid the rebellious Querin to topple the mighty Empire, or give in to evil and help the Kytarii Empire recapture the lost Querin worlds? Also, what mysteries await you in the vast depths of the uncharted Ji Nebula, and Northern clusters? Will they yield more friendly allies, or a new deadly foe? The New Galaxy awaits you Captain..... The first large expansion Plugin for EV Override, F-25 boasts over three hundred new systems, two hundred  planets, over thirty new weapons, ships and outfits, stunning ship graphics, and 158 missions.

2415.title: Babylon5EVO201.sit
2415.author: Anonymous
2415.description:
Babylon 5 has been described by TV Guide as "TV's most complex and compelling sci-fi series," and has already won two Hugo awards for best dramatic presentation. 

This plug-in starts off somewhere during the year 2259, but by the time you accumulate enough money and combat rating to take on the core missions, it will correspond to the events at the beginning of 2260, or the third season of Babylon 5. This plug-in therefore contains spoilers for the show, in the form of missions, for episodes up to the end of the fourth season (fifth season events to be added in a future release).

2533.title: Frozen Heart - the No
2533.author: Anonymous
2533.description:
BASK in the setting suns and sleazy bars of New Venus! ENJOY a cold cup of coffee paid for by a princess! EXPLORE a fifty thousand year old cryogenic maze! 

For the first time on the internet in unencrypted form, this is the novel on which Frozen Heart was based.  It's yours all you have to do is reach out and touch

2666.title: Star Wars.sea
2666.author: Anonymous
2666.description: This is a fix for the infamous circle of lasers and torpedoes spinning in a halo around the player.  The problem was caused by too many separate plugs in the Star Wars set.  I combined the separate plugs into one plug and it now works fine.  Problem solved.  This plug includes the resources from SW20 1.0, SW20 1.03 fix, ¥Extra ShipsÄ v.2, ¥OExtra Ships, Extra Ships Cheat and SW202 cheat.  The cheat resources were added last to ensure that their data was not overwritten, so this is the cheat version of the plug.  I have made no changes to the original resources other than to copy them all into one big plug and have tested it for a long time without any mishaps.  It's bug-free and it's now yours if you click the "Get It" link to the right!  Enjoy!

2572.title: Lubaria.sit
2572.author: Anonymous
2572.description:
I never had time to finish Lubaria if you want to continue the work then please do so, just read the Read Me! It was going to add many new ships and planets, and I got a fair bit done - it already adds about 20 ships, so I consider it a job well done!
Any comments? just mail: will22@excite.com
Submitted by Captain Will.

2717.title: Ultima 1.0.1.sea
2717.author: Anonymous
2717.description:
Ultima is a medium-small plug-in which throws you into the heart of a struggle between a budding military government, the Ultima, and the renegades who plague their systems. You can help Ultima in many ways: as a trader, set up a collection of tourist planets and make tons of money become a fighter pilot and you will gain upgrades and weaponsÉ if you can prove your combat ability.
Version 1.0.1 fixes many bugs and typos which were in 1.0, as well as adding more missions, weapons, and systems than there were previously.  While Ultima will never match anything like Frozen Heart, it certainly beats the plain old "two new ships, one new outfit, and one new mission" addons. If you find a bug, send a bug report to: alethiometer@earthlink.net.

2298.title: EVO Quickstart 2.0.sit
2298.author: Anonymous
2298.description: This plug is for those of you who don't have 20 hours a day to play EVO. It makes it so you start out with a freight courior instead of a shuttle, and you are already a member of the UE military and the Miran Trading organization. The only thing new in version 2.0 is it actually works! (sorry about the first version). Enjoy.

2409.title: AquaButtonsforEVO
2409.author: Anonymous
2409.description: Aqua Buttons for EVO is a port of the original EV Aqua Buttons to Override. All of the button graphics are changed to a smooth, dreamy gray (and round shape) appearance and switch to aqua blue when clicked, giving the game a very OSX look. Compatible with any of your other favorite plugins. Screenshots can be found here: http://dreamwave.evula.net/plugins.html. File by Kyle Katarn (a.k.a. Cap'n Skyblade). dreamwave@evula.net

2515.title: extra weapons1.0.0.sit
2515.author: Anonymous
2515.description:
Extra Weapons, the sister plugin of Extra Outfits, adds 9 new weapons to the EVO universe, ranging from stationary mines to powerful energy weapons.  

In addition to Extra Weapons, you also get "Blink Fix", which fixes the mysterysous SAD/SAE "blinking", "Homing Fix", which fixes the spastic behavior of some guided weapons in EVO, and more!

2707.title: UE Interceptor
2707.author: Anonymous
2707.description:
This plug adds a new ship to every shipyard of the UE.
Its also compatible with "Voinian Speed-Fighter".

If you want to mail me: BuchholzChris@aol.com

2520.title: F25v20.sit
2520.author: Anonymous
2520.description: F-25 v.2.0: Completely re-written and re-done from the bottom up, F-25: The Last Empire follows the same basic story of exploration into the Ji Nebula, but that's where the similarities with the previous versions end. With this new scenario come 235 completely new missions, uniform 2-D graphics, a revamped galaxy, multiple endings and decision points for the player. Early on, the player must choose with whom they will side in the dangerous new galaxy, and all that follows is a direct consequence of this decision...

2293.title: ES-99
2293.author: Anonymous
2293.description:
The E/S-99 is a cheat ship plug-in with new graphics
It is great for completing missions
and is compatible with most plug-ins.

2308.title: Ghost 1.0.0
2308.author: Anonymous
2308.description:
This is my first Plugin, I started it this morning and have just finished. It basically gives you an invisible killer beam, which destroys anything instantly (it kills the dreadnaught with a tap). Let me know of any bugs!
tomkanes@aol.com

2311.title: hunters.sit
2311.author: Anonymous
2311.description:
Koingo Software's first EV:O plugin, Stupid Hunters 1.0, is quite a useful concoction indeed! 

Y'know when you dominate you're first system, and the government that you pissed off in the process sends dangerous, well-armed Bounty Hunters after your head? Well, no more! With Stupid Hunters 1.0, those once fearsome hunters will get what's coming to them, and in a rather inventive fashion at that! Enjoy!

2335.title: SCW1.1.sit
2335.author: Anonymous
2335.description: This cheat adds a ship called the Super Crescent Warship, a heavily modified Crescent Warship capable of taking on all comers.  By Shayon Ghosh (shayborg) -- shayborg@hotmail.com

2338.title: SlowJump114.sit
2338.author: Anonymous
2338.description: This is the newest version of SlowJump, it fixes some bugs and compatability issues. By request Ive modified my other plug QuickJump to have the opposite effect. It makes your jumps take a number of years to complete. This is usefull if youve dominated planets. When you need money buy the outfit and watch the tribute money roll in. Then sell the outfit when you have all the cash you want.

2361.title: Zachit Arada1.1.sit
2361.author: Anonymous
2361.description: This plug-in makes the Zachit Arada available for purchase after completing the Zachit missions.

2366.title: Atlas095NorthernRim.sit
2366.author: Anonymous
2366.description: Adobe Acrobat Reader is required to open this map of part of the EV Override galaxy.

2367.title: Atlas095NorthTip.sit
2367.author: Anonymous
2367.description: Adobe Acrobat Reader is required to open this map of part of the EV Override galaxy.

2368.title: Atlas095SouthernRim.sit
2368.author: Anonymous
2368.description: Adobe Acrobat Reader is required to open this map of part of the EV Override galaxy.

2364.title: AnnotatedTemplates102
2364.author: Anonymous
2364.description: This is the EV Override Annotated Templates for EVO 1.0.2.  This adds support for EVO 1.0.2's new template changes.  This file is mutually exclusive with any other Annotated Templates and is not backwards-compatible with EV or EVO 1.0-1.0.1.

2388.title: Shipbuilders Guide.sit
2388.author: Anonymous
2388.description:
Shipbuilders' Guide 1.0.0 for Infini-D - This stand-alone document provides a complete step-by-step walkthrough for making spaceship graphics for EV/O in Infini-D. All steps are laid out in a simple, easy to understand format with graphical enhancements. 
By Divals the Conqueror (micahg@microserve.net)

2396.title: 360Repulsor.sit
2396.author: Anonymous
2396.description:
360 Repulsor has one weapon - the Repulsor shield. Unlike the repulsor beam, the repulsor shield works in a full circle around your ship repelling all ships within its range away from you. Now you can keep all those Azdaras away from you at all times.
Requires version 1.0.2 to work.

2426.title: CaptainHectorProtector
2426.author: Anonymous
2426.description: This is a plugin that can slow down Captain Hector's ship so it almost never appears. This is my first plugin.

2450.title: DialogExpander1.0.sea
2450.author: Anonymous
2450.description: Dialog Expander 1.0 by Coraxus - This contains sets of plug-ins that expand the windows of dialog boxes when you are viewing the galaxy map, hailing a planet, or checking your player info. Each plug-ins are designed to cover various ranges from 640x480 to 1280x1024. Dialog Expander also contains plug-ins compatible for the classic version. Comments or questions, notify me at prefectural@yahoo.com

2487.title: EVO1.0.2EnahncementsFixes
2487.author: Anonymous
2487.description: This package contains two plug-ins for EVO. The first, 1.0.2 Enhancements, provides a number of modifications to take advantage of the new features introduced in Override version 1.0.2. The second, 1.0.2 Fixes, provides a number of fixes to some minor problems in Override including a couple of odd changes made in 1.0.2. Any changes you disagree with may easily be deleted in ResEdit.

2547.title: Harder100
2547.author: Anonymous
2547.description: This EVO plugin makes EVO combat more challenging, interesting, and faster.  It doubles the amount of weapons and their firing rate on all ships.  It has very little incompatibility and should work with any existing piolet file.  Use this plug if you think the game is too easy or just are bored and want to make combat more challenging and interesting.  Hope you enjoy :)

2674.title: StrandVessels1.1.sea
2674.author: Anonymous
2674.description: StrandVessels1.1 -by Coraxus. This plug-in that contains a number of new ships for each strands including Zachit, now has improved more than ever. Other than correcting mistakes and configurating one ship, I've also added bonus plug-ins as well. Important: Read the ReadMe document for something very important.

2688.title: TBFL test version.sit
2688.author: Anonymous
2688.description: This is The Better Fork-Lift  Testing Version. It is also my first submission. I really want to spend more timne designing than testing so any one who wants to help, please do.

2689.title: Teddy-Trouble
2689.author: Anonymous
2689.description: Ever wanted to fly a teddy-bear into deep space? Thought not.  Oh well, download this neat little plug-in and you can!

2705.title: True Pers
2705.author: Anonymous
2705.description: A small plug-in made on request of Jubee, which gives all mission-specific weapons their own outfits, and makes it so that ships such as The Disco Bison retain their specialities after capture. - Esponer, heavyrabbit@aol.com

2770.title: MC100Carbon.dmg
2770.author: Anonymous
2770.description:
MissionComputer for EV Override 1.0.0, Mac OS X Version
MissionComputer is a new mission editor for EV Override. It does not replace traditional plug-in editing tools such as ResEdit, but complements them to provide an easier way of editing missions, descriptions, commodities, and the game's year offset. It also provides an easier way to look up the resource IDs needed when setting up plug-ins. This version of MissionComputer is a Carbon application designed for Apple's next-generation operating system Mac OS X. It may also function under certain versions of Mac OS 8.x and 9.x, but the archive is built to be opened under Mac OS X, and users of older operating systems are advised to use the Classic version.

2773.title: MissionComputer 130 Classic
2773.author: Anonymous
2773.description: (Classic Edition) MissionComputer is a scenario editor for Escape Velocity and EV Override. The current version edits missions, descriptions, dudes, fleets, governments, and (on EV Override only) the year offset. This edition of MissionComputer is for systems prior to Mac OS X.

3319.title: Rengade Pocket Warship
3319.author: striation macker
3319.description: This plugin replaces the turn coat with the Renegade pocket warship.

2641.title: ReignOfTheVoinians
2641.author: Anonymous
2641.description:
Reign of the Voinians as plugin for Amrosia Software's Escape Velocity Override. It adds 20 missions to the Voinian string, and requires the following:
Escape Velocity Override v. 1.0.1. (1.0 will not work.)
The completion of the "Destroy Verril Prime" mission.

2452.title: DispArmorPercent.sit
2452.author: Anonymous
2452.description: Display Armor Percentages tells players how much armor a ship has left as it gets pummeled (instead of simply saying "Shields Down") -- excellent when fighting Voinian ships.  Now you'll have a general idea of when that ship will finally blow up!

2640.title: ReignOfTheUEv12
2640.author: Anonymous
2640.description: With the Emalgha/UE alliance, the destruction of the Dreadnought and the liberation of the Hinwar, you have begun the destruction of the Voinian Empire... Now, it's time to finish the job. Reign of the UE picks up where the central UE objective left off, continuing the UE-Voinian War all the way to the fall of Voina. With 47-48 new missions, 1 new purchasable ship, a few new outfits, and several new characters, Reign of the UE is what UE lovers have been waiting for! Version 1.2 - Compatible with "Persons of the EVO Webboard v2.0"

2497.title: EVOFixer1.5.sit
2497.author: Anonymous
2497.description:
EVO Fixer is a simple plug for EVO that changes some things in EVO that I thought need changing/fixing. It lets you buy a UE Fighter Bay, Zidager Fighter Bay and Zidager expansion thingy as well as letting you keep the UE Cloak when you change ships, it also replaces the EVO menu screen with one that doesn't look so grainy. Finally, I thought it was unjust that Matt changed it so that a turret takes up a turret slot and a gun slot so now a turret just uses up a turret slot. Also ever noticed that in the shipyard pic that the Voinian Cargo ship has two turrets on it but you only get one when you buy it? Well now it has two so it is actually the ship you see in the pic. The armor display is now a seperate plug because I noticed from some posts on the EVO Board that not everyone wanted this feature, especcialy during the mission for the Voinian Dreadnought. I've added  an EVO icon so that when Command-Q is pressed the EVO icon appears instead of the EV one. Comm Pictures for the igadzra ships so that you can see the ships when you hail as your escorts have also been added. Finally the description for the Emalgha turret has been changed so that it makes sense in EVO 1.0.2 The plug is now specifically for 1.0.2 becuase of the Emalgha Desc change.  I'd like to point out that this plug is not a cheat plug because to gain access to the bays you HAVE to do the appropriate mission e.g. the missions for the Zidager to get access to the Zidager fighter bay. Enjoy. 	

Version 1.5.0 released 1st of September 2000

2595.title: NewTech7.sit
2595.author: Anonymous
2595.description: This is NewTech7!!! I've added MANY NEW SYSTEMS, MANY NEW OUTFITS, WEAPONS, SHIPS and COOL GRAPHICS!!! DOWNLOAD IT NOW!!! Zampaman Plugs

2733.title: Voinian
2733.author: Anonymous
2733.description: This plug combines Ken's Voinian War with other plugs and elements of other plugs to make a single plug with no bugs. Now you can use Meowx Design Studio's MAGMA with a bigger map window, the weapons fix plug, DispArmorPercent, and have some of the better ships from Star Wars 2.03 and Babylon 5 all as part of one plug. I admire the craftsmanship and creativity of many plug designers and would like to be able to use each of their plugs all the time, but conflicts inevitably preclude this possibility. So I chose a few of my favorites and assigned new resource IDs to cut-and-paste those favorites into my Voinian War plug to enhance gameplay. Most of the features in this plug are not my work, but the labors of others. I simply brought several of the best together into one package so that the EVO community could enjoy the benefits of many great plug designers simultaneously without problems. I love the result and I know that you will also. Read the description of Ken's Voinian War for a description of the basic plug, and now imagine it with better graphics and the maximum of 64 ship classes and several other enhancements. Enjoy!

2732.title: Voinian Speed-Fighter
2732.author: Anonymous
2732.description:
This is a simple plug for EVO.
You can buy a new ship at every shipyard of the Voinians.

If someone interested eMail me:    BuchholzChris@aol.com

2494.title: EVOEnhancementsFixes1.1
2494.author: Anonymous
2494.description: This package provides a number of fixes to some minor "problems" in Override and also a number of modifications to take advantage of the new features introduced in Override version 1.0.2. New to version 1.1: Missiles and rockets will do greater damage at shorter range as their unburnt propellant explodes Ships all have varying speeds and maneuverabilities Igadzra ships will now show images in the communication dialog when captured.

2538.title: GalaxyClassOverride31.sit
2538.author: Anonymous
2538.description: Galaxy Class: Override is a plug-in that adds the availability of a ship similar to the Galaxy Class Starship from Star Trek: TNG. This new version provides improvements in graphics, better ship physics, new weapons, use of the Galaxy by AIs, a storyline for the Galaxy Class development in the EVO galaxy, and several other new features and bug fixes. In addition to the ship it provides a new base, Utopia Planitia, where the ship and several upgrades for it are sold. The new ship is intended to be a step (albeit a large one) above even the UE Cruiser, for captains experienced captains who need even more firepower. However, the Galaxy almost makes a great ship for Trekkers who just want the firepower, too. Enjoy!

2511.title: evtg-pro.sit
2511.author: Anonymous
2511.description:
Thank you for downloading EV Target Graphics Pro!  We hope you enjoy the enhancements this plug-in makes.  We believe it provides a welcome improvement to EV Override, and eye candy is always loved.  =]
					Fortunately, this is one Read Me you wont have to read in its entirety.  There are no outstanding issues with EV Target Graphics Pro that would cause you significant trouble, or any trouble at all.  This document is provided for contact information and the designers notes on the plug-in.

2514.title: extra outfits1.3.2.sit
2514.author: Anonymous
2514.description:
Extra Outfits adds 13 new, balanced, outfits to the EVO universe. It includes an Auto-Eject System, (like that found in the original EV) 3 types of Armor, a slightly bigger regional map, and many other useful things.  (you'll have to download it to find out what!)

Version 1.3.2 has, among other things, better graphics and grammar, and includes many bug fixes.

2562.title: Ix-Mo
2562.author: Anonymous
2562.description: This Plug-In contains 3 new ships and 4 new weapons with new graphics, feel free to use them in your own plug-ins. There is also a new government and a new system with two planets.

2730.title: VarterWarship
2730.author: Anonymous
2730.description:
this plug adds one new ship to the UE. It is a small assult ship. 
any comments or bugreports can be send to alexzander@hotmail.com

2435.title: Complete Incomplete.sit
2435.author: Anonymous
2435.description: This is an update to the original Incomplete plug-in.  It has more graphics, more ships, more of just about everything, including a beginning area which is finished enough to play for at least a few hours.  Eventually you will run into incomplete areas, but then you should know that from the title.  As before, use this as a source of ideas, graphics, and sounds, or play it for pleasure, or try your hand at completing it as a total conversion.  Good Luck!

2499.title: EVOGovtFixer1.0.sit
2499.author: Anonymous
2499.description:
Ever get really mad when you're in a big battle, and then you acidentlly hit one of 
you're allies and suddenly all of you're allies turn aginst you? Well, this plug changes that.
This is a set of plugs that will make it so you're weapons can't hit the ships of the 
respective government, and they likewise will never attack you. For example, if you're going to be
fighting with the UE, you'd put in the UE/Emalgha/Hinwar plug. Also, you can't attack traders
that are being protected by a government that can'y attack you. (Sorry to all you Renegades
out there)

2779.title: persMaker.sit
2779.author: Anonymous
2779.description: Populate your EVO game with real world players! PersMaker 1.0 allows EVO plugin developers to automatically generate plugins containing prs resources based on pre-existing EVO pilot files. Simply drop a pilot file--or a bunch of pilot files--onto the application icon and PersMaker will make a plugin. PersMaker takes ship upgrades and dominated spobs and player aggression into account when generating the plugin, resulting in AI prs ships that are similar to their human players.

2454.title: Display.sit
2454.author: Anonymous
2454.description: Display for EVO 1.0.2 by IonStorm improves the display and armor graphic.  It is very small, universally compatible, and should help your game play--so why not get it.

2420.title: BeyondTheCrescent11.sit
2420.author: Anonymous
2420.description: A set of 23 intermediate-to-advanced missions following the UE mission line which are geared more towards the mission-oriented types of EV players. This plug-in investigates some of the mysteries offered by EV Override, and picks up where the UE-Voinian missions left off.

2329.title: overrideedge.sit
2329.author: Anonymous
2329.description: !WARNING! This plug in makes ALL ships and outfits available anywhere for 1 credit and weigh nothing. This may spoil some fun in discovering these things on your own. User beware

2436.title: CompuWars.sit
2436.author: Anonymous
2436.description: CompuWars is the humorous, almost editorialistic, story of the everlasting battle between Apple and Microsoft to gain market share...and the universe, to boot. Sure, theyre in peace now, but just look ahead 100 years! Thats exactly what CompuWars does: jumps ahead 100 years to watch Apple and Microsoft blast off from Earth in a race to capture the universe.

2567.title: Kens Voinian War.sit
2567.author: Anonymous
2567.description: Adds 7 ships, several outfits and makes hidden outfits available everywhere outfits are sold. Features instant warp, a larger map viewing window, improved interface graphics like better buttons and targeting displays, and eliminates special missions incompatible with the new storyline. The new storyline: you are a popular war hero called upon to defend the people from a Voinian invasion. The Voinians are much tougher, the dreadnought is everywhere, and the bounty hunter has a souped-up dreadnought and missiles with your name on them! You will need the new outfits if you hope to make Voinia pay tribute, guaranteed! This plug has no known bugs even after hundreds of hours of play, but it is incompatible with plugs that add other outfits or ships. This plug is completely compatible with Meowx Design Studio's MAGMA v.2.01 (I never play EVO without it)!

2576.title: magma201u.sit
2576.author: Anonymous
2576.description: Meowx Design Studios' EVO : MAGMA is the critically acclaimed EVO plug in that now has over 5000 downloads.  MAGMA completely replaces the sounds and graphics from Escape Velocity Override with brand new, realistic ones. Not much is new in this, version 2.0.1 just tying up a few loose ends.  v2.0.1 will be MAGMA's final version.  This is an updater plug, you may download it if you have MAGMA v2.0 or MAGMA v1.0 with a v2.0 upgrader plug.

2611.title: Paaren Station.sit
2611.author: Anonymous
2611.description: Ever thought that the research on Paaren Station is really never finished? Well, now you can buy all Voinian Technogoly (including ships) at Paaren Station! If you work for the UE, and like the Voinains' ships, then download this plug-in!

2726.title: UniverseNextDoor112.sea
2726.author: Anonymous
2726.description: The strands discover the true nature of the council, and unite to destory it. Travel is allowed beyond the rim of the crescent. What lurks past those desolate worlds on the rim? Only you, the enteprising captain who set the fall of the council into motion, can find out. UND contains copletely orginal graphics and a thrilling story that explores the deepest mysteries of EVO. In this update, the story is even more intriguing, and the battles are easy enough for the average captain to complete.

2284.title: cloak
2284.author: Anonymous
2284.description: This plug-in makes the cloak available, at what I think is a reasonable price (ONLY 1 million dollars), throughout United Earth space.

2535.title: G.T.P.S..sit
2535.author: Anonymous
2535.description:
My first plug-in for EVO, G.T.P.S (Glaive Turret Propulsion System) is neither a cheat weapon, nor a tactical disadvantage. Glaives are human-made rocket turrets for the renegade-squashing traders in all of us! 
Proven to kill a Helian in 3 hits!
Made by Willim McCrae, who loves praise and suggestions.

2589.title: NewShips
2589.author: Anonymous
2589.description: This is my second plug it adds three new ship one almost avalible everywhere and two avalible in UE space

2661.title: Spaceballs- The Plug-In
2661.author: Anonymous
2661.description: For fans of the film "Spaceballs," Spaceballs- the Plug-in has two new planets in a new sytem one jump from Sol.  The planets are: Spaceball and The Other Planet (also known as 'Druidia.')  You can buy lots of cool outfits on Spaceball, and trade between the two planets is great.  Enjoy! (Made in a couple seconds just for fun by: Luke)

2558.title: ImprovedGraphics v1.0.sit
2558.author: Anonymous
2558.description:
For all you people who are tired of plain regular EVC  EVO ships, this colorful collection is just for you. Right off the bat  THIS IS NOT A PLUGIN! THIS IS COLLECTION OF "IMPROVED" EVO  EVC GRAPHICS!!! gasp Whew, unfortunately, you will need to use ResEdit to open them, but after that, you're in the money. Keep your eyes out for more stuff including weapons, ships, and outfits... maybe even planets (If you like my stuff). If you have any questions or comments or find any bugs (if that is possible...) email me at theonlyguy@dustinwright.com

Dustin Wright

2586.title: NeutronicBlaze
2586.author: Anonymous
2586.description: Ever wondered what the UE did with the Voinian technologies they aquired? Apparently, not much. Paaren Station seems to be little more than a retailer for a couple of oversized, slow-firing weapons. This plug-in, however, changes all that. It adds a short string of missions in which a new weapon is developed on Paaren Station using a bit of Voinian neutron technology. Updated models of UE ships may also be found along the way...

2621.title: Plasma 1.0.1
2621.author: Anonymous
2621.description: Plasma 1.0.1 is the newest upgrade for, of course, EVO plasma. But several things are different: For instance, I have changed the sounds of the explosions sound around a little. I have also edited the large explosion a little, and it looks much better. I hope you enjoy it! Visit www.cerolia.pyar.com for updates and info.

2795.title: Shipsforpluginmakers2
2795.author: Anonymous
2795.description: If you liked Ships for plugin makers, you will love 2. It has 6 ships, and a read me file explaining changes to the package. This is version 2.0. It was submitted by Brent.

2451.title: DisableSmokeTrails.sit
2451.author: Anonymous
2451.description: The Disable Smoke Trails Plug gives you the option to disable the new smoke trail feature in EVO 1.02. This Plug is compatible with ALL other plugs. Use this if you are on an older computer and the smoke trails slows the game down, or you just want the option. You must have the latest version to use this, however this file is not required to play Escape Velocity: Override.

2634.title: Reign II- Shades of Evil
2634.author: Anonymous
2634.description: Reign II: Shades of Evil takes place directly after the events in the original Reign, continuing your quest to aid the Voinian Empire in conquering the galaxy. Now, with their capital captured, and their border in ruins, the United Earth government must turn to their allies for help against this unbeatable foe. Here, you are presented with your final decision: Swear yourself forever to the Empire and begin the conquests, or return to the side of humanity, away from the dark, forboding Shades of Evil.

2490.title: EVO Webboard Ships.sea
2490.author: Anonymous
2490.description: Ever wanted to buy your own ship? Well guess what, now you can do just that! In EVO Webboard Ships, several people from the EVO webboard have submitted designs for new ships, and YOU get to pilot them! EVO Webboard Ships adds a few systems, several fleets, dudes, and a new government. And, of course, 10 new ships! Expect an update in the future. Enjoy the plug-in!  -  Nova6

2564.title: journeymf
2564.author: Anonymous
2564.description:
Along their territorial borders, Human and Voinian ships engage in almost daily skirmishes. Elsewhere, merchants and civilians are terrorized at the hands of ruthless renegades who care only for their own well being, and in the universe beyond, wars rage and civilizations fight for their very survival...

Out of this turmoil a handful of mercenaries joined together, sharing the hope that they could make a difference. They banded together, fighting for glory and justice for any government that would sponsor them...

Journey MF is a plug-in for Ambrosia Software's hit game Escape Velocity: Override. It is based on the story of the UEVO RPG, which is run and maintained by Blazer.

Journey MF features 22 all new missions, 7 new ships, half a dozen new weapons, and all new dynamic systems that change in response to your decisions and actions.

2650.title: Secession15
2650.author: Anonymous
2650.description: Secession 1.5 has the same great plot as Secession 1.0, plus revised texts, improved graphics, an all-new EVO splash screen, and many other small improvements.   Secession 1.5 includes 1 new major government, 6 new ships, 11 new outfits including 6 new weapons, 32 new missions, and more!   Secession is unique among expansion plugs in that it can match your preferred EV:O targeting computer style. Whether you use EV Target Graphics, A-Radar, EVO Tech Update, or none at all, Secession can blend in seamlessly with your game. It is also fully compatible with most other EV:O enhancements, including EVSO Override, Lightning Jump, the EVO Map Embigulator, EVO Boom!, and many others.

2491.title: EVOBoom.sit
2491.author: Anonymous
2491.description: EVO Boom! is a simple plugin for Ambrosia Software19s EV Override. It changes the explosion graphics in EVO from those tiny little sparks to big dramatic fireballs. All you have to do is drop it in your "EV Plugs" folder and you ready to go! There are no known incompatibilities. So you can use this plug along with all your other favorites!

2295.title: EVO Cheater 1.0
2295.author: Anonymous
2295.description: Tired of those cheap cheaters that always have something wrong with them? Well, this is the plug for you!! EVO Cheater 1.0 was tested for 2 days by myself. Nothing happened! All oufits are 0 credits, weigh nothing, and you can have 999 of most things you would need that many of. All ships are 0 credits also.

2347.title: SuperPluginEVO.sit
2347.author: Anonymous
2347.description: SuperPluginEVO lets you get a super strong ship for no money, and at any planet.

2355.title: Upload this file
2355.author: Anonymous
2355.description: This is my first plug so it is not very big.  It includes my invention, the "Hold Beam".The "Hold Beam" when shot will as you probably guessed, will (normally) stop the enemy dead in his tracks while draining his shields.I hope you all enjoy!!! 2000-2001 "ICE" Software    By: Derek Watkins    version 1.0.1  (For EVO 1.0.1)

2390.title: TradeSecrets
2390.author: Anonymous
2390.description: Ever wondered where to go to sell Saalian Brandy? Trade Secrets 1.0 tells you which planets (and systems) to go to for trading 'junk', as well as the price, profit, and distance you'll have to go. --KOPD

2413.title: ArcturusShipPak101.sea
2413.author: Anonymous
2413.description:
This plugin updates the eight ships and related outfits that were
   introduced in the original EV Arcturus Trading Company scenario
   and makes them available in EV Override. An Arcturus Outpost
   station and several trading fleets are also included. The plugin
   contains no missions.

2418.title: Beamfix
2418.author: Anonymous
2418.description:
Fixes the bug that the phased beam on some computers does not fire into the correct direction and does not damage other ships.
v1.0
by Andreas Sandner
© 10. August 2001 Starlight Development

2445.title: DBlade.sea
2445.author: Anonymous
2445.description: This Plug-in adds 1 system, 3 ships and many outfits and weapons.

2464.title: Enhanced Azdara 1.0
2464.author: Anonymous
2464.description: Ever wanted to buy that awsome Enhanced Azdara that you helped test?  Well now you can.  This plug allows you to buy the Enhanced Azdara Bay and the Enhanced Azdara to the game as soon as you complete the appropriate missions.

2466.title: Enhanced EVO
2466.author: Anonymous
2466.description: This Add On enhances the ships by giving them more weapons.  Please rate all add ons you down load!!!

2468.title: EscapeVelocityTX
2468.author: Anonymous
2468.description:
EV-TX is an expansion to EV, with all the possibilities from EVO 1.0.2.
Many new ships, outfits (some new graphics), weapons and other stuff awaits you.
You will start in one of two systems and must do 5 missions (really simple) to be free. If youve done this missions you come into a large universe with many new dangerous races and a lot of hard missions.
Only the best pilot survives here ... 
Please mail me your suggestions or improvements: BuchholzChris@aol.com
(And read the docs to inform you about some very important things.)

2500.title: EVOGovtFixer2.0.sit
2500.author: Anonymous
2500.description:
This is version 2.0 of EVO Govt Fixer. A few bugs have been fixed, thanks to user bug reports. The human Renegade plug now works, support for
merchants in now in a seperate plug compatable with all the rest, the Huron Rebels won't attack you while they're pretending to be militia
ships, and you can attack merchants when the Agdzari Stror missions require you to.

How often has something like this happened to you: You're in th middle of a huge battle, working for the UE. You notice that a few UE
Destroyers are ganging up on a Voinian Cruiser, so you decide to join them. The Cruisers just about to go boom, when all of a sudden a stray rocket from
you're ship hits one of the UE Destroyers. The Destroyer thinks you're tring to attack it and returns fire. You're forced to fight back, being in a UE Cruiser
and not being able to outrun the destroyer. Suddenly, you're on the hit list of every ship in the system. This plug should change that. For every major
government in EVO, there is a plug for it in this set. Simply put the plugs in for the governments you want to be allied with. After that, all ships of that
government will behave like you're escorts, except they won't fly with you and you can't order them arround. Baically, you're weapons can't hit thier ships,
and visa versa. They will also stick up for you more if you get attacked.

2501.title: evomenufix.sit
2501.author: Anonymous
2501.description: This fixes the grainy menu in EVO. In other words it replaces the old with a new, non-grainy one. By LoneIgadzra - William_Makley@sad17.k12.me.us

2509.title: EVSO Updater
2509.author: Anonymous
2509.description: This is the updater for EVO Stellar Objects.

2529.title: Flying Toasters
2529.author: Anonymous
2529.description:
Flying Toasters for EVO:version I.0
A long time ago there was a plug which added a plunger to EV.
More recently there was the "Flying Pumpkins" plug for EVO.
Now I have added to the list of inane,insane,or just plain weird ships on EVO by creating the Flying Toaster.
It adds one ship,the Flying Toaster(Who would've guessed?),as well as a new weapon,the Toast.
Enjoy!

Made by Nicholas
(nicholas@netaccess.co.nz)

2604.title: Outfit MODs.sea
2604.author: Anonymous
2604.description: Outfit MODs  changes the way turrets and guns are handled, allows you to buy and sell any fighter bay (as long as you've done the appropriate missions), allows you to keep or rebuy special outfits such as the cloak, zidagar systems enhancement and the experimental shield enhancer.  Download and read the Readme for other features.

2625.title: PreviewPics2
2625.author: Anonymous
2625.description: This is a preview of my upcoming TC plug Drifter.  The preview is some assorted picts of Drifter and an annoying readme all packed into a nice little folder with the drifter logo (a human fighter) and stuffed for your convinience.  By the way EV meets EVO was cancelled to create this much better plug. This is the preview of Drifter you SHOULD download.  I the other one I forgot the credits in the readme.

2658.title: SolGraphs.sit
2658.author: Anonymous
2658.description:
This plug-in adds new graphics to the Sol system, made with real photos and others created artificially. If you have any problems with my plug, e-mail me at: vorstar@mac.com
Hope you enjoy it.

2694.title: TheReaper
2694.author: Anonymous
2694.description:
This is the story The Reaper, it won an unofficial(the awards didn't end but before they did, the votes were equal for my sotry and aqua regia's story, The Artifact, which is a great story) shared award with the artifact. This story is a hilarious comedy, so don't expect masterful literacy here. Its an easy read, but sure to please
-By Beigejaguar33

2737.title: WEIncomplete
2737.author: Anonymous
2737.description: Wariom Empire: Incomplete is the beta version of my new expansion plug-in.  Since I have spent a long time working on it, I decided to release a beta version so you can look at the graphics (or use them), watch the rival governments fight each other, and even work on it yourself.  For more info, please read the Read Me file.  By Rolland Smith.

2746.title: ZachitShips1.0.sit
2746.author: Anonymous
2746.description: Zachit Ships 1.0 adds Zachit Ships so you can buy their ships after doing a few of the Zachit Missions. Version 1.0 -By Taylor (AKA Onii7)

2752.title: EV Graphics.sit
2752.author: Anonymous
2752.description:
THIS IS NO PLUG-IN!!! You'll have to be somewhat experienced (simple copypaste abilities) with ResEdit to use this.
But what is it? It's all classic EV ships rerendered in some magma-style (thanks for that great plug, meowx) way.
By Bolle bolle@surf-callino.de

2756.title: evo-templates
2756.author: Anonymous
2756.description: The Annotated EV Override Templates are Resorcerer-optimized templates that go way beyond your typical plug-in editor.  Not only do they take advantage of all of Resorcerer's advanced template features, they are replete with commentary from the EVO Bible as well, so you don't have to keep switching back and forth!  This makes editing plug-ins a no-brainer.  (Note: Not for ResEdit users, only works with Resorcerer)

2503.title: EVOPlus.sit
2503.author: Anonymous
2503.description: The must-have plug-in for EV Override. EVO Plus extends almost every element of this wonderful game. From over 40 new missions to several new ships and almost a dozen all-new systems as well as two dozen modified ones, this game is a must have. And by optimizing graphic consistancy, this plug-in is less than 300k (and less than 150k to download). This plug-in will keep you engrossed for hours. But the best part is, youll never even know where EV Override ends and where EVO Plus begins. This plug-in is also compatible with many other plug-ins, including EV Steller Objects and EV Target Graphics.

2470.title: EV Overlord Suite
2470.author: Anonymous
2470.description: This is folder has in it the patches you need to be an overlord! A must download, well worth the time trust me! Even includes a patch for 1601.80M credits!!!!!

2710.title: UE Ship and Outfit Expander
2710.author: Anonymous
2710.description:
Updates to Version 1.5 Fixes the small bugs that plauged the previous release.

	   UE Ship and Outfit Expander Version 1.5 adds the much needed variety of
          ships and outfits to the UE in EVO. Within this Plug you will find many of
          the first games beloved ships, As well a few originals. Also the Outfits
          now have the followinq: Auto Ejecter, Sheild Recharger, Hyperspace Mod
          and more... Finally their are some mission related ships that will be
          released by doing the missions for the UE. All the Ship discriptions have
          been modified to flow with the games storyline. UE lovers this is the plug
          you've been waiting for!

2510.title: EVStellarObjects.sit
2510.author: Anonymous
2510.description: This Plug will change all those primitive graphics reused from older games/versions, and replaces them with brand-new, professional looking 3D graphics. Every stellar object from asteroids to planets and their caption pictures have been redone.

2399.title: A-Radar110
2399.author: Anonymous
2399.description:
The latest version of A-Radar, which replaces the standard EVO radar graphics with something a little more suitable. Also adds a easter-egg mission, and an outfit, which both should make the game a lot easier.
More information at http://jonsevo.cjb.net

2602.title: ObsidianButtons.sea
2602.author: Anonymous
2602.description: Obsidian Buttons is a pair of free plugins: one for Escape Velocity called "EV Obsidian Buttons" and one for EV Override called "EV Override Obsidian Buttons."  They both provide replacement graphical buttons for the respective games you may prefer them to the originals.

2693.title: TheFourthReich1.0
2693.author: Anonymous
2693.description: The Fourth Reich is an addition to the EVO galaxy, contains 19 new systems, numerous missions, 14 new ships, several new outfits, and plenty of challenging action. Features a split ending depending on the decisions of the player. The Ilboro have launched their formidable military forces in an effort to capture neighboring systems. Join with the forces of freedom to stop this neo-fascist expansion. But that is only the beginning ... discover the mysteries of devastated worlds that lay abandoned for centuries. Why have even the Ilboro abandoned attempts at conquering this mysterious region of space? Are the ancient myths of an omnipotent being true?

2481.title: EVO Flashy Orbs.sit
2481.author: Anonymous
2481.description: A small plugin that changes the graphics of the main screen's orbs so that they flash. Pointless, but it looks kinda cool.

2687.title: SWextraShipsV.2.sit
2687.author: Anonymous
2687.description: Adds Target Pics,TIE Defender,TIE Advance,Medium Transport,corellian freighter, and Y-wing to SW2.Questions or Comments to Dranow@pacbell.net, my other e-mail was down. Looking for someone to make some new SW ships, respond if interested.(All ships added were created by Kris Hauser.)

2627.title: quitfe
2627.author: Anonymous
2627.description: Quit FE solves the intensely irritating problem of Frontier Express.  Many times, in the later stages of the game, I have landed on a planet to see if I can get a mission from the bar, and instead of the galaxy-spanning, all singing all dancing mission series, I just got offered a cargo run to Outpost Alpha.  An almost equal number of times, I have thought: "Damn.  I wish I could go back and choose not to take their recruitment mission."  Well now you can!

2704.title: TripleAgent151.cpt
2704.author: Anonymous
2704.description: Do you want to play more than one side of the Strand war? This plug-in will allow you to do it! Just find and accept the mission and you are off. Despite what I said I released a new version, but it ONLY contains new contact information plus some editing of the Read Me file to be more obvious. All you need to know is in the read me file, please only email me confirmed bug reports.

2785.title: PlanetForge.sit
2785.author: Anonymous
2785.description:
PlanetForge 1.0.0 TE - By Bryce Schroeder
This novel program lets you create your own customized world graphics without either a expensive 3D Graphics Program or hours of work in a 2D program. It exports planets as either PICT files or pDes files, which take up only a fraction of the space needed for a PICT. It comes with sample worlds, and is also FREE - just send me an e-mail on what you thought of it. Also, it includes a sneak preview of EV: The Fallen Empire.

2748.title: Already used MisBits
2748.author: Anonymous
2748.description:
I recensed te MisBit used in EVO so as to do not use them in my plugs, and I wondered : "why should I force other people to do the same thing?" and I released it. In Excel file.

Zacha Pedro

2536.title: GalaxyClassOverride201.sit
2536.author: Anonymous
2536.description: Galaxy Class Override is a plug-in for Star Trek:TNG fans. It adds one base, Utopia Planitia, over Mars in Sol which makes available the Galaxy Class starship, as well as a new UE fighter model for use with the galaxy class. It also adds the Galaxy Class to the standard UE Warships flët and düde resources, so they'll appear in the game. The images of the Enterprise used in this plugin are original material generated in Infini-D. Each icon and sprite frame were individually raytraced. Each texture map on the model used is accurate to the letter based on the Galaxy Class blueprints from Paramount (even though you may not see them all in these renderings).

2372.title: EVO Ship Guide.sit
2372.author: Anonymous
2372.description: Which is better? The UE cruiser? The Igazra? Or perhaps even the Voinian Cruiser? This and many other questions are not answered, but this guide gives you all the numbers and analysis to help you figure out for yourself whats the best ship for you. This version includes corrections, plus additional data to bring the guide up to date with EVO 1.0.2

2410.title: Arach
2410.author: Anonymous
2410.description: This plug-in fixes various mistakes in the previous version.  In version 1.1 of Arach , there is now a dynamic universe which changes depending on what missions you do and adds in the awesome weapon the Shockwave Generator.  E-mail me at dshuren@teleport.com for comments.  Note:  this is NOT an updater, you don't need to download the previous version to play this.

2610.title: OverrideEV1.5.1.sit
2610.author: Anonymous
2610.description: Version 1.5.1 of my Plug-In OverrideEV. Ever want to play as your old Escape Velocity ships again, but you don't want to have to go back to the old, small, and boring original EV universe? Well look no further, this Plug-In is for you! It adds multiple ships and weapons from the original EV to EVO. So now you can go about your normal EVO business but with your favorite original EV ships, such as the Kestrel or Rebel Frigate!

2649.title: Secession
2649.author: Anonymous
2649.description:
The independence of Huron and the development of the Needle Jammer have greatly changed the balance of power between the UE, the renegades, and the human Independents. Many humans in the central galactic sector feel that being part of the UE is no longer necessary for their survival. And so, in secret, they begin to prepare  for Secession.
Secession continues the plot-lines of Free Huron, the Needle Jammer, and the Nebula Penetration Device. It introduces 1 new major government, 3 new purchasable ships, 3 new AI ships, 6 new weapons, 11 new outfits, and more than 30 new missions.

2397.title: 45Sprite.sea
2397.author: Anonymous
2397.description: 45ºSprites by Coraxus. If you're tired of having the same top down animation, why not try looking at ships at a 45º angle? This ought to liven things up for your game.

2512.title: EVTGOverride1
2512.author: Anonymous
2512.description: EV Target Graphics Pro alters your entire EV Override experience! It gives EV Override a whole new brushed-metal appearance, makes many cosmetic improvements, and -- of course -- adds the 3D target graphics synonymous with EV Target Graphics.

2628.title: Rapscallius 1.0.sit
2628.author: Anonymous
2628.description: The UE Frontier has participated in the war. As it seems, the tides are beginning to safely stay in the hands of the UE, and the universe becoming human-safe. In this Plug-In, seven new ships with non-stock graphics invade your local EVO 1.0.X application. Bragging new weapons complete with graphics, the revival of the Laser Cannon, and a few easier missions, Rapscallius closes the lid on any rumors of PSeyfferth Software delivering a weak Plug-In. Here it is, folks. Rapscallius 1.0. It is for the taking.

2660.title: Space Amoeba 1.0.sit
2660.author: Anonymous
2660.description: Where did they come from? Why are they here? What do they hope to achieve? No one knows. They are the Space Amoebas, and they lurk in the most desolate corners of the Galaxy.
