Their deadly Crystal Rays are feared by all. This plug-in adds one ship, (or should we say, biological terror!) the Space Amoeba. The galaxy will never be the same...

2736.title: Weapons Fixer1.0.1
2736.author: Anonymous
2736.description: Ever get tired of weapons doing figure 8 around thier target, well now you don't have to!!! This is a fix for little error. Now, this won't elimnate jamming or interference, but it will greatly improve the performace of all Homing Missles. This version fixes the turning rate that was affected by my first changes.

2517.title: ExtraOutfits1.2
2517.author: Anonymous
2517.description: Extra Outfits 1.2 adds 13 new (balanced) outfits for EV: Override.  (Requires 1.0.2)

2411.title: Arach
2411.author: Anonymous
2411.description: Ever since space travel, the Jarvans and the Arach have always rubbed each other the wrong way.  At first it started out as petty fighting, but it soon turned into all out war.  The Jarvans may have an advantage in combat with power, but often times the Arach have strength in numbers.  Arach adds 4 new ships (with new graphics), 11 outfits, and 7 new weapons.

2427.title: CaptainsOfFreeport11.sit
2427.author: Anonymous
2427.description: The Captains of Freeport adds several new ships and missions, and extends the Freeport series of missions. Anybody with large anti-UE feelings should try this plug-in.

2472.title: EV-TX 1.0
2472.author: Anonymous
2472.description:
EV-TX 1.0.2 is the updated version of EV-TX.
I have overtaken some ideas of other new plugs and kill some incorrect things.
Note: This sit have all files of the game, you dont need the old files to play it.

EV-TX is an expansion to EV, with all the possibilities from EVO.
Many new ships (no new graphics), weapons and other stuff awaits you.
You will start in one of two systems and must do 5 missions to be free (really simple). As you do this missions you come into a large universe with many new dangerous races and a lot of hard missions.
Only the best pilot survive here and can buy a Bio Warship.

2474.title: EV Super Pack
2474.author: Anonymous
2474.description: This is a set of my favoirte plugs: EV Override Edge, Death Blade, and Lightning Jump.  They all have been modified to work seamlessly together.  It also includes a souped-up turncoat that replaces the original.  Be careful because all the turncoats have the mods.

2485.title: evo-missions
2485.author: Anonymous
2485.description: EVO Missions adds some of the "lost" features of EV to EVO.  Traders can now ask you for assistance or escort, pirates set up derelict traps, and more.

2620.title: Planetgraphics2.0
2620.author: Anonymous
2620.description: Planetgraphics 2.0 changes the dull grainy planets of EVO and replaces all the odd angular asteroids with strikingly gorgeous new graphics created in Strata Studio Pro. This plugin is an absolute must have for all players of as it provides a much richer graphical experience without affecting the gameplay at all. An absolute must have plugin.

2739.title: Wowser
2739.author: Anonymous
2739.description: This adds some new ships to the EV:O universe. I got the graphics from the links at the EV:O links page. Please email me what you think. g3_2@tidepool.com. Enjoy!

2742.title: XtremeTechcompletread.sit
2742.author: Anonymous
2742.description:
This is the complete read-me file of Xtreme Tech.
If you downloaded this plug, download this too.
Sorry, I put a resumed read-me in the plug-in folder, but this is the complete one.
Enjoy my plug.

2734.title: Voinian Quickstart
2734.author: Anonymous
2734.description:
This plugin is very simple. It only allows you to play the Voinian mission string whenever you want. The first mission is still availiable on Pax. 
By PizzaMista

2727.title: UpWithUE 1.0
2727.author: Anonymous
2727.description: Up With UE is a addon plugin that adds four new and cool UE ships, two new weapons, and cool graphics. It requires you to have the Vonian Dreadnought series of missions done to buy the ships. But otherwise, the New ships are almost everywhere. This is a must-have for those who like the UE.

2780.title: PFEv3.0.sit
2780.author: Anonymous
2780.description: Pilot File Editor 3.0: When making a plugin, have you ever wished you could define which systems appear on the map at the start of the game? How about starting on a planet other than the default one? Have some dominated planets? Start in a different ship, have different weapons and outfits, higher rating, maybe have more cash. Or maybe you've always wanted to make an alien epic set in the Earth year 1066. Now you can, and more. With Pilot File Editor version 3.0, you can edit nearly every attribute of an Escape Velocity Overide pilot file using a graphical interface. Much more usable and stable than PFEv2.0b

2676.title: StressRelease
2676.author: Anonymous
2676.description: The Stress Release Plug-In was thought up one day after Karrde was at some hardware store.  The store had these little stress release balls in the check-out aisle, so as Karrde patiently waited for the line to move forward, he tested out the little "stress release" balls.  After squeezing them several times, he did not feel relieved of his stress, but actually quite violent.  Back home, Karrde started to wonder...is there a better way?  Thus, the Stress Release Plug-In for EVO was born.

2492.title: EVOButtons
2492.author: Anonymous
2492.description: Tired of those same old EV buttons? Is it ruining your experience of EVO? Then EVO Buttons is the plug in for you. It gives your buttons a sleeker, more modern look and can improve your EVO experience.

2588.title: NewPlanetGraphics.sit
2588.author: Anonymous
2588.description: 'New Planet Graphics' is a plug-in which replaces the planet, and station graphics, it also replaces the veiw's that you see when you land on a planet or station.

2616.title: PersonalityShips
2616.author: Anonymous
2616.description: Ever tried to capture a personality ship like the U.E.S. Incontrovertible or the Z.S.S. Disruption? You may have been disappointed to find that all extra weapons and shields the ship has are lost upon capture. Download this plug-in to allow seven of the more powerful personalities found in EVO to be captured and still keep their power, including such weapons as the Turreted Phased Disruption Beam and the Disco Machine Gun.

2655.title: Shortcuts plug.sit
2655.author: Anonymous
2655.description:
This plug in adds a lot of shortcuts very helpful in most of the missions.
I'ts not very compatible, so I recomend you to use it alone.
Hope you enjoy it.

2686.title: SWextraShips.sit
2686.author: Anonymous
2686.description: Adds TIE Advance x1, TIE Defender, Corellian Transport/freighter to SW2, This is just a plug to spice up your gameplay(need target Pics though, this is not finished) Will add more ships, outfits, fleets, persons, dudes, in later versions if you like this. Problems? Comments? e-mail vidiotv@hotmail.com Read the "READ ME!!!!"

2431.title: ClassicShips1.0.sit
2431.author: Anonymous
2431.description: Classic Ships 1.0 introduces 16 legendary ships from the original Escape Velocity (ranging from the humble Courier to the mighty fighting vessels of the Rebellion and Confederacy) to the universe of EVO.  Along with these classic ships is an array of weaponry and outfits from EV- from laser cannons to space bombs and fighter bays to tritanium armor.  Classic Ships contains elaborate detail of the original EV- even the exact sounds and "Hire Escort" texts are in Classic Ships.  Classic Ships isn't a cheat that makes everything too easy and boring- no, a skilled pilot like yourself is going to have to scour the universe for some of your favorite ships and outfits.  Whoever said "Legends never die." was right.  From the maker of Extra Ships 1.2.1.

2638.title: ReignOfTheUE
2638.author: Anonymous
2638.description: With the Emalgha/UE alliance, the destruction of the Dreadnought and the liberation of the Hinwar, you have begun the destruction of the Voinian Empire... Now, it's time to finish the job.  Reign of the UE picks up where the central UE objective left off, continuing the UE-Voinian War all the way to the fall of Voina.  With 47-48 new missions, 1 new purchasable ship, a few new outfits, and several new characters, Reign of the UE is what UE lovers have been waiting for!

2419.title: bettersmoke.sit
2419.author: Anonymous
2419.description: While playing EVO 1.0.2, I noticed something about the new smoke trails and they look, well, crude. With some work, I came up with this. Just pop it into your plug-ins folder and take a look at the vastly improved smoke graphics.

2579.title: magmasl10.sit.bin
2579.author: Anonymous
2579.description: MAGMA Ship Lightener is great if you have a dark screen.  If MAGMA's ships look too dark on your screen, simply download this plug and put it in your folder with MAGMA.  This is version 1.0.

2322.title: Mass Flare.sit
2322.author: Anonymous
2322.description:
This is the ultimate weapon, you can kill any enemy in one shot, just the thing for people who like the story more than the fights, replacing the Forklift!!
aBaheili

2443.title: DarkStation10
2443.author: Anonymous
2443.description: Dark Station adds one new space station, in South Tip Renegade space. What's so special about that? I'll tell you. This is no ordinary space station we're talking about here. The ST Renegades use Dark Station as an outlet for all rarer, more powerful (and highly illegal,) renegade technology. Awesome (but balanced) new outfits such as Neutron Rams, Sideswiper Missiles, and Gunpod Bays will blow you away. New Technology is implemented on AI Renegade vessels too. Download this plug-in, and strap on your seat belt. You're in for the ride of a lifetime. Created by Samurai (Ambrosia SW webboards.)

2647.title: SADEFixer.sit
2647.author: Anonymous
2647.description: Although EVO v1.0.2 brought a lot of cool features, it also carried a bizarre bug: SADs and SAEs would flicker occasionally while in flight. After a little work in ResEdit, I created this plug to fix that problem. Send in all comments, complaints, etc to goomeister. E-mail me at kilakila@lava.net, or find me on the boards.

2537.title: GalaxyClassOverride31
2537.author: Anonymous
2537.description: Galaxy Class: Override (GxO) is an Escape-Velocity Override plug-in that makes available a ship similar to the "Galaxy Class" Starship seen on Star Trek: The Next Generation.  This ship is fabulously powerful, handles exceptionally, and can carry more cargo than a superfreighter.  In addition, the plug-in provides a bonuses, including new weapon systems for the vessels, a new subcraft for the Galaxy, a warp drive add-on for one-day jumps between any system, a MkII ECM System for high powered ECM against all types of weapons, a Sensor Array add-on for elimination of interference in every corner of the galaxy, and a new stellar object, Utopia Planitia, located over Mars to provide for the sale of all add-ons and ammunition.

2597.title: NewTitleSongsforEVO.sit
2597.author: Anonymous
2597.description:
Is the EVO title music getting to your head?
Need some thing else for a change?
Well, I've recorded (an composed) 2 songs.
One is a rock version of the classical EV, the other is a completely original piece by me [hehe (!)]

Hope you enjoy it!

Carl
aka
Black Beard

2290.title: dreadnaught bay
2290.author: Anonymous
2290.description:
This plug-in adds the purchasable outfit  "Dreadnaught bay" and the carried fighter "Dreadnaught". Simple enugh, the catch is that the dreadnaught itself in now equiped with a Dreadnaught bay, so that by launching 1 Dreadnaught, and assigning it to attack, you can max out the ships in the system with Dreadnaughts.
Careful though, the fighters of your fighters hold no alegance to you, and will attack you if provoked.
A simple plug-in, brought to you by Just Smile And Nod (aka Kendall Noble)

2346.title: SuperMoney2.0
2346.author: Anonymous
2346.description:
In this version I fixed the shutle bug i hope. 
This plug adds a credit max out mission. enjoy
Andrew-----g3_2@tidepool.com

2402.title: Aliens 1.0.sea
2402.author: Anonymous
2402.description:
Remember the Aliens from Escape Velocity? Have you ever wanted to pilot the Alien Cruiser? Now you can! My plug-in allows you to purchase alien ships and weapons, for a price. Or if you like to cheat then you can get it all for free. I also altered the ships a little bit to make them seem more like the aliens would, because the ships have different stats between the games. From the maker of Invincibility 1.1.

send questions or comments to M51DPS@lacrosse.com.

2428.title: CdH -
2428.author: Anonymous
2428.description:
Exciting new plug-in with 70+ missions. Play as the Voinians in their quest at galactic domination. Created by Crush de Hasshish productions - CdH.
-pist

2453.title: DispArmorPercents2.sit
2453.author: Anonymous
2453.description: This file is the same as Display Armor Percentages 1.0, except that the armor of the Voinian Dreadnought is not displayed.  This allows Admiral McPherson's claim that one does not know when the Dreadnought will be destroyed to stand true.

2486.title: EVO-Sizer  1.2.sit
2486.author: Anonymous
2486.description:
Do you think that some fighters are not to scale? Do you think the plasma siphon could use a better graphic?  If so this plug is for you.  EVO-Sizer 1.2 makes fighters closer to scale gives you a better sprites for planets. And makes the game more real. 

v. 1.2

by Danny Holley

v. 1.3 will be soon with new astroids and more!

2504.title: EVOQuickstart1.2.sit
2504.author: Anonymous
2504.description:
This plug is for those of you who don't have 20 hours a day to play EVO. It makes a 
few changes so you don't have to spend as much time just getting started. First, you don't 
start out with that crappy shuttle, you get a freight-courior instead. Aslo, you are 
already part of the UE military, the Miran Trading Organization, and the UE has already made 
contact with the Miran, so you don't have to do those missions to do any alien missions.
This plug was made by Will Werner. My other two plugs, EVO Govt Fixer and Paralell Universe
are also avalible on this site.

2505.title: EVOSI1.0.0.sea
2505.author: Anonymous
2505.description: EVOSI1.0.0 -by Coraxus. After almost a year in development, EVOSI (Escape Velocity: Override System Interface) is finally here. This plug-in will revamp graphics and sounds you will find in any interface items throughout the game. The main feature is the targeting system, the design is radically changed from the boring standard square frame box. With this plug-in, it will change the way you feel playing EVO. If you really want to go far, then be sure to download 45sprites and Sounds Galore. Let me know what you think, k? and be sure to read the documentation first. prefetural@yahoo.com

2565.title: Kalar War I
2565.author: Anonymous
2565.description:
by Tom Smith, politicissue@hotmail.com
Set 50 years after Escape Velocity Override, this plugin will take you beyond the Ji Nebula. Most people don't enjoy what they find there, though. The incredibly powerful and warlike Kalarians are taking on the entire civilized galaxy, and it looks like the aliens might win. A plugin with massive changes to the EVO universe there's plenty of missions, planets, and ships. It is the first battles of the Kalarian War!

2578.title: magmas101.sit
2578.author: Anonymous
2578.description: The EVO : MAGMA Subwoofer pumps up the bass for the new sounds in EVO : MAGMA.  Provided, of course, you have a good sound system.  Subwoofer is compatible with all versions of MAGMA and may even work with it.  (I haven't tested it without MAGMA, though, so I don't reccomend it.)

2583.title: Minstrel v
2583.author: Anonymous
2583.description: From the poeple who brought you "the Ambrosia Class" and the "forklift at freeport"comes a new plug-in.  This plug-in adds 1 ship to the EVO universe,"The UE Minstrel".  This ship will aid any pilot destroy the renagades and surpass the tests of the Azdgari.  E-mail Pernicious plug-ins at: jackjackjack@earthlink.net

2617.title: PhantomInterface.sit
2617.author: Anonymous
2617.description: Tired of the same old EV interface? This plug-in changes all the buttons, the ship panel display, and various other graphics. This interface is a nice change, adding cool green graphics to planet dialogs, giving EV a new "sci-fi" look . An alternate ship panel graphic is also included. Look forward to more interfaces in the future. Phantom artoo-detoo@att.net

2622.title: Plasma 1.0
2622.author: Anonymous
2622.description: Plasma 1.0 is a explosion replacer! Tired of those fire like explosions? Well, EVO plasma is youre anwser! It has unique plasma-blue explosions that whip up the game and add to the real coolness of the actual game. Check at www.cerolia.pyar.com for updates and upgrades.

2635.title: Reign of the Voinians
2635.author: Anonymous
2635.description:
This is an updater file for Reign II and Reign II: Magma. It fixes a small mission bug. Special thanks to Capn' Mattmo for spotting this one.

Ignore this file if it is anything less than 956 Kbs.

2643.title: RenegadeVessels1.0.1.sea
2643.author: Anonymous
2643.description: RenegadeVessels1.0.1 -by Coraxus. This new version with a set of three new ships for the independent government and the human renegades comes with 2 more compatible plug-ins for EVOSI and 45ºSprite.

2646.title: SaboteursRealm10b4r3
2646.author: Anonymous
2646.description: The story of an Earth exploration mission gone wrong, which evolves in to a huge epic of war, betrayal, sacrifice, and redemption. With 50 missions of plot twists, mission forks, and main characters, as well as tons of custom ships, weaponry, and graphics, its enough to rival even some total conversion plugs!

2665.title: SpodiaShips.sit
2665.author: Anonymous
2665.description:
Spodia Ships- v1.0.0
by Nick Kasprak

Thank you for downloading the Spodia Ships plugin.   It adds 6 new ships and a few weapons (with original graphics) to the EVO universe.    I am not good at storylines or descriptions or systems or anything like that, so I have not included a story to go along with these ships- they are available everywhere.   It is not intended to be a serious plug, so if anybody wants to use the graphics in a real plug-in feel free to do so, just ask me first please.

2670.title: StarterPlug1.sit
2670.author: Anonymous
2670.description: The Starter Plug adds a few missions (with high rewards) tied into the Destroy Voinian Dreadnought mission series, and makes a few modifications (e.g. to the Miranu Heavy Freighter), all to aid players who don19t have 20 hours a day free to play EV Override.

2673.title: Strandvessel1.0.1
2673.author: Anonymous
2673.description: Strand Vessels 1.0.1 by Coraxus. This plug-in diversifies various Crescent factions as well as Zachas with a variety range of ships, such as the Igadzra carrier and the Zachit Zachara, plus more. This version has some fixes as conflicting data has been found. Sorry for the inconvenience it may cause. It is recommended that you replace the old version immediately.

2699.title: Transferic Shipyards Demo.
2699.author: Anonymous
2699.description: Yeah, im new in the web, but ive made millions of plugins before, only they didnt get to the web. Anyway, im making a saga of a race called: Akilae, and my first part of it will be soon in the air. It will be called "Transferic Shipyards". Well, i was  making the photos, and when i got to the ships, i said: I just have to make a demo. So here it is, with only 2 systems and the ships ill use. My mail is chofelqb@hotmail.com.

2715.title: UEPhaseII.sit
2715.author: Anonymous
2715.description: Ever wanted to make some UE ships better? Now they are. I made 5 new ships. 4 of them are upgrades, 1 of them is new. Now the UE Carrier has a better chance of defeating a Voinian Crusier. Watch them in action. Also, a bonus bay for the new ship.

2719.title: Ultima 1.0b3.sea
2719.author: Anonymous
2719.description: Ultima is a medium-small plug-in which adds eight new ships, twelve new outfits, six new systems (ruled by one highly aggressive new government), and more. Much more has been added since beta2, and all known bugs have been exterminated. While Ultima will never match Frozen Heart, it certainly beats the plain old "two new ships, three new outfits, and one new mission" plug-ins. It has to be the most exciting, feature-rich plug-in since two hours ago! If you find a bug, send a bug report to: alethiometer@earthlink.net."

2720.title: Ultima 1.0.4.sit
2720.author: Anonymous
2720.description: Ultima is a medium-sized plug-in which throws you into the heart of a struggle between a budding military government, the Ultima, and the renegades who plague their systems. You can help Ultima in many ways: as a trader, set up a collection of tourist planets and make tons of money. Become a fighter pilot and you will gain many classified upgrades, weapons, and ships  if you can prove your combat ability. Version 1.0.4 fixes several bugs and typos, including one where the escape pod looked like the Ultima Gunship. If you find any bugs, send a bug report to: alethiometer@earthlink.net.

2729.title: VarterWarship
2729.author: Anonymous
2729.description: This plug adds one new ship to the UE system. This fix some minor bugs.  Version 1.1  Comments can be send to alexzander100@hotmail.com

2775.title: MissionComputerX-140
2775.author: Anonymous
2775.description: By David Arthur. A scenario editor for Escape Velocity and EV Override which can edit the desc, dude, flet, govt, junk, misn, pers, and year resources. (Mac OS X Edition)

2528.title: Flying Pumpkins.sit
2528.author: Anonymous
2528.description:
This is something I whipped up partly for the heck of it and partly to see if I could get something to home right in EVO 1.0.2. Actually, the main reason is my dad wants me to do a vegetable total conversion. While I didn't actually do a TC, you may get a few laughs out of this. Sorry for the lack of outfit graphics for the pulp cannon, like I said, it was also a test... Enjoy!

-LoneIgadzra (william@route26.com)

2442.title: cwov102.sit
2442.author: Anonymous
2442.description: CompuWars is the humorous, almost editorialistic, story of the everlasting battle between Apple and Microsoft to gain market share...and the universe, to boot. 100 years from now, political power is in the hands of both forces CompuWars documents how they abuse it.

2525.title: flakplug1.0.3.sea
2525.author: Anonymous
2525.description: This is (hopefully) the final release of the Flak Plug. For those who don't know, Flak Plug is a pointless little plug-in my Dave which adds flak weapons to EVO. Flak Plug is comatible with most non-TC plugins. The plug adds 2 new weapons, the Flak Turret and Powered Flak Turret. Tired of that 12th crescet fighter that always gets you with that Ultimate combat rating? Take it out with powered flak! Now, that's not the cool part. This flak is nearly identical to the flak in Ares. Fire it and watch submunitions fly off and hurt other, non-targeted fighters! Uses sprites from Ambrosia Software's Aresª

2703.title: TripleAgent15.sit
2703.author: Anonymous
2703.description: Do you want to play more than one side of the Strand war? This plug-in will allow you to do it! Just find and accept the mission and you are off. Despite what I said I released a new version, but it ONLY contains new contact information plus some editing of the Read Me file to be more obvious. All you need to know is in the read me file, please only email me confirmed bug reports.

2784.title: PilotFileEditorV2.sit
2784.author: Anonymous
2784.description:
Pilot File Editor 2.0

When making a plugin, have you ever wished you could define which systems appear on the map at the start of the game? How about starting on a planet other than the default one? Have some dominated planets? Start in a different ship, have different weapons and outfits, higher rating, maybe have more cash. Or maybe you've always wanted to make an alien epic set in the Earth year 1066.

Now you can, and more.

With Pilot File Editor version 2.0, you can edit nearly every attribute of an Escape Velocity Overide pilot file, from the name of the ship, to which mission bits have been set.

2449.title: deltafighter.sit
2449.author: Anonymous
2449.description: This was an experiment in ResEdit shipmaking and 3D modelling. It adds one ship, the Delta Fighter. Enjoy!

2455.title: Dominion.sit
2455.author: Anonymous
2455.description:
This is a complete rewrite of the EVO unverse, based upon the Dominion War from Star Trek: Deep Space Nine. It has massive amounts of ships, systems, and missions, and is a must have for any Star Trek fan. As opposed to downloading it from this server, it can be downloaded from a faster mirror at:
http://www.angelfire.com/trek/evo_dominion/dl.html

2471.title: EV-TX 1.0.1sit
2471.author: Anonymous
2471.description:
EV-TX is an expansion to EV, with all the possibilities from EVO.
Many new ships (no new graphics), weapons and other stuff awaits you.
You will start in one of two systems and must do 5 missions to be free (really simple). As you do this missions you come into a large universe with many new dangerous races and a lot of hard missions.
Only the best pilot survive here and can buy a Bio Warship.

2488.title: EVO Fixer 1.4.1.sit
2488.author: Anonymous
2488.description: EVO fixer is a simple plug for EVO that changes some things in EVO that I thought need changing/fixing. It lets you buy a UE Fighter Bay, Zidager Fighter Bay and Zidager expansion thingy as well as letting you keep the UE Cloak when you change ships, it also replaces the EVO menu screen with one that doesn't look so grainy. Finally, I thought it was unjust that Matt changed it so that a turret takes up a turret slot and a gun slot so now a turret just uses up a turret slot. Also ever noticed that in the shipyard pic that the Voinian Cargo ship has two turrets on it but you only get one when you buy it? Well now it has two so it is actually the ship you see in the pic. The armor display is now a seperate plug because I noticed from some posts on the EVO Board that not everyone wanted this feature, especcialy during the mission for the Voinian Dreadnought. I'd like to point out that this plug is not a cheat plug because to gain access to the bays you HAVE to do the appropriate mission e.g. the missions for the Zidager to get access to the Zidager fighter bay. Enjoy.

2554.title: IgadzraBeam.sit
2554.author: Anonymous
2554.description: Have you ever wanted to use the Igadzra beam that you fought against while fighting for the Zidagar?  Well, this plugin allows you to, after completing the respective Igadzra missions.  Made by Lord Gwydion.  Report any bugs, problems etc. to psychothefirst@yahoo.com, or try and find me on boards.

2577.title: magma20u.sit
2577.author: Anonymous
2577.description: If you have EVO : MAGMA version 1.0, then you can save yourself some downloading time and get this plug-in.  It will update your copy of MAGMA to version 2.0.

2592.title: NewTech4.sit
2592.author: Anonymous
2592.description: Hi! I'm Zampaman! This is NewTech4! This time I've added SIX NEW SHIPS, THREE NEW SYSTEMS and many outfits. DOWNLOAD IT!!!

2636.title: Reign of the UE 1
2636.author: Anonymous
2636.description: With the Emalgha/UE alliance, the destruction of the Dreadnought and the liberation of the Hinwar, you have begun the destruction of the Voinian Empire... Now, it's time to finish the job. Reign of the UE picks up where the central UE objective left off, continuing the UE-Voinian War all the way to the fall of Voina. With 47-48 new missions, 1 new purchasable ship, a few new outfits, and several new characters, Reign of the UE is what UE lovers have been waiting for! Version 1.1

2681.title: Superships 1.2.sea
2681.author: Anonymous
2681.description:
This plug will make it so you you can see Voinian dreadnoughts and  
UE Cruisers flying around, attacking outposts,etc. It will also give the Hinwar dreadnoughts.  
WARNING: this plug may not function correctly unless you have done the following: completed the Hinwar missions and the Anna Balashova missions. In version 1.2 if you capture a dreadnought and make it your ship it won't lose all it's weapons as soon as you enter an outfit shop.

2540.title: GalaxysEdge.sit
2540.author: Anonymous
2540.description: Taking place within our solar system, Galaxy's Edge is the most thoroughly researched and astronomically accurate Escape Velocity: Override plugin ever. Galaxy's Edge has a detailed plot, featuring all-new governments, ships, outfits, planets and missions, as well many unique hacks.

2744.title: Zachit Ships
2744.author: Anonymous
2744.description: As with my other plugs this is the latest version and it fixes some bugs and compatability issues. This plug just adds six new ships and a couple outfits (no new graphics, yet) available at Zachit Outpost after the completion of the Miranu Gunship missions. I made these ships to be alternate choices to the large slow bulky UE Cruiser.

2743.title: Zachit Missions
2743.author: Anonymous
2743.description: Did you ever feel that the Zachit mission string kinda leaves you hanging? Well, if you answered yes, then this is the plug for you! Zachit Missions adds 14 new missions to the Zachit string. The graphics in this plug-in were created by Ian Raymond, and I think that they're awesome! By: Sam Langendorf

2324.title: MightyAzdaraRadix.sea
2324.author: Anonymous
2324.description:
These two plug-in's make two new ships. The first ship is an upgraded Azdara. The second ship is a really cool ship called The Radix. Both ships are invincible and can be bought anywhere. HAVE FUN!! 
          Plug-in's by:
               Joel Bethke

2283.title: cheat.sit
2283.author: Anonymous
2283.description: The EVO Cheat-O allows you to buy anything and everything in the EVO universe for pocket lint.  It also adds a galactic map feature so when you buy a map, it will show you the whole universe.

2280.title: BarMoney.sea
2280.author: Anonymous
2280.description: For those who don't want to deal with UE Shipping, this replaces it with a mission that gives you 300mil, from the bar.  My first patch, so use my e-mail in the Readme file to send problems/suggestions.  Have fun XD

2276.title: KICKING SHIP.sit
2276.author: Anonymous
2276.description: Did you just start out and wanna kick BUTT?  But you don't have the time to make enough money to buy a Power Ship? If yes, this is the Plug-in for you.

2524.title: Flak Cannon Plug1.02
2524.author: Anonymous
2524.description:
HEY! Get this one. Not the other FlakCannon Plug. I did something wrong in the other one. This one is the corrected version.
This plug adds a flak cannon and turret like in Ares.

2548.title: Hellscream
2548.author: Anonymous
2548.description:
This is My First Plug For EVO And It may Have Some Bugs All it does is adds One ship for the Voinians it has no "Other Names" file so th name Of the ship 
Won't appear. if You find any bugs E-mail me at Cambaker@ shaw.ca

2601.title: Nuke
2601.author: Anonymous
2601.description: After the deadly Voinian Dreadnought was destroyed the UE needed something to counter this awesome ship. They have spent years researching this new weapon, long ago banned from use on Earth. But, in the final stages there seems to be some trouble

2606.title: Overflow1942
2606.author: Anonymous
2606.description: Overflow 1942 is an old World War II plug-in that was used as a reference for the team now working on a new World War II plug.  Contact Rexbo2002@aol.com for details.

2614.title: PersMaker1.sit
2614.author: Anonymous
2614.description: PersMaker 1.0 allows EVO plugin developers to automatically generate plugins containing pers resources based on pre-existing EVO pilot files. If the pilot in question has dominated any spobs, a novel govt is generated and the dominated spob govt is modified to match the new govt.

2618.title: PhasedBeamFixer
2618.author: Anonymous
2618.description: This small plug-in will fix the Phased Beam problem in 1.0.1. It will become obsolete with the release of EVO 1.0.2 :).

2697.title: TOPsMods2.sit
2697.author: Anonymous
2697.description: T.O.P.19s Mods 2.0 is a pair of background plugs for EV Override. They modify the game to provide a richer, more challenging playing environment for the experienced player. Version 2.0 is compatible with "Beyond The Crescent" and other current plugs for EVO. Novices should probably play EVO through at least once before using this plug.

2714.title: UENavy1.1.sea
2714.author: Anonymous
2714.description: UENavy1.1 -by Coraxus. This is the updated version of the UE Navy. Reconfiguration of both the UE battleship and the UE interceptor were dramatically improved. As usual with new updates, the UE Navy also has extra goodies.

2721.title: Ultima 103.sea
2721.author: Anonymous
2721.description: Ultima is a medium-sized plug-in which throws you into the heart of a struggle between a budding military government, the Ultima, and the renegades who plague their systems. You can help Ultima in many ways: as a trader, set up a collection of tourist planets and make tons of money. Become a fighter pilot and you will gain many classified upgrades, weapons, and shipsÉ if you can prove your combat ability. Version 1.0.3 fixes a few minor bugs and inconsistencies and tweaks the Ultima Warship, Scarab and Fighter so that you can hire them as escorts. If you find a bug, send a bug report to: alethiometer@earthlink.net.

2740.title: Xtreme Tech 1.1.sit
2740.author: Anonymous
2740.description:
This is the second version of my plug, "Xtreme Tech".
It adds a new title song, new sounds, outfits n' weapons.
This file contains a complete read-me.
Hope you enjoy it.
Sirio

2764.title: EVOrganizer Beta.sit
2764.author: Anonymous
2764.description:
Version 1.5b
This is a utility for EVO plug developers. It is very simple, and what it does is organize all the applications and guides in a single app. The app can open any development program and can automatically open the plug in them (not all applications support this feature, though.) EVOrganizer also supports a help feature (It will be expanded in later releases.)
Keep in mind that this is a beta and may have bugs, although it has been tested.
Sys requirements:
PPC, OS 8.5 or higher, Applescript

I would appreciate any feedback, feature suggestions, bug reports, etc. My contact info is included in the Read Me.

2357.title: warlord
2357.author: Anonymous
2357.description: This is the first plug in made by FireFly Team Software (http://darkpheonix1560.tripod.com). It is a three plug in pack that has some utilitys to take over the Galaxy, including an enhanced Cresent Warship. You'll also be able to buy anything, anywhere, at 1 Cr!

2375.title: EVO Mission Workbook.sit
2375.author: Anonymous
2375.description: This is a Microsoft Excel file that can serve as a checklist for what EVO missions you have completed.  This is a full list of all the storylines you can complete in EVO.  Includes information on where to find each mission, the ranking and combat rating you need, and other important information.  Email skywalk759@aol.com for questions.

2712.title: UEDreadnaught.sit
2712.author: Anonymous
2712.description:
This is my first plugin for EV/EVO/EV3 (hopefully). It adds a new ship, the UE Dreadnaught.
(I apologize if anyone else took this ship title. Sorry!). This ship is superb, but you must get all the weapons yourself.  This will be changed in a upcoming upgrade, along with the fact that you must start a new game in order to get it.  This means you start with the Dreadnaught, not the shuttle. EV players might find a similarity in ship design.  E-mail me
for questions:scifiguyTR@netscape.net

2291.title: DreadNotTheDreadnought101.sit
2291.author: Anonymous
2291.description: Some people are more interested in the EV Override story than the fights. For those people, the Voinian Dreadnought takes too long to beat. This plug-in makes it much easier to beat.

2384.title: Galactic Map
2384.author: Anonymous
2384.description: Replaces the Regional Map with Galactic Map. It shows a map of the entire galaxy!

2400.title: advance.sit
2400.author: Anonymous
2400.description:
Advance 1.1

Tired of all those bership plug-ins and cheats?  Good.  Advance is the plug-in for you.

This plug-in is intended to bring some new ships into the game to enrichen it rather than to spoil its beautiful balance.  First and foremost, the additions are meant to be REALISTIC, to suit their governments well, and to keep the game balance and style intact.  After two years of lying dormant on my HD, the plug-in has now reached a satisfactory state of completeness which may or may not be augmented in further versions.

2462.title: EmalghaHeavyShips1.2.sea
2462.author: Anonymous
2462.description: EmalghaHeavyShips1.2 - By Coraxus. The latest updated version of these vessels. This set comes with special bonus plug-ins

2498.title: EVOFixer2.sit
2498.author: Anonymous
2498.description:
EV Override Fixer 2.0

Better Graphics, Improved Weapons, Additional Effects, Everything needed to enhance the game further.

2612.title: ParalellUniverse
2612.author: Anonymous
2612.description:
Paralell Universe adds the entire Escape Velocity universe onto the Excape Velocity: Override
Universe. Some of the ships had to be left out because of game constraints. Several things I found
very useful in the EVO, like the Proton Bolt Cannon which does as much damage to shields AND armor
as a phase cannon does to shields, and several more things are proable there that I haven't found yet.
Enjoy.

2662.title: Speed Plug 1.0.sit
2662.author: Anonymous
2662.description: WARNING! This plug is for expert pilots only! May cause newbies to melt upon startup! It speeds all the ships up making it an extra challenge to those who've mastered the game.

2690.title: The Traders Union 1.0

Have Fun!!

~D1~

2782.title: pilotConverter.sit
2782.author: Anonymous
2782.description: Something that should have been made when EVO(Escape Velocity Override) first came out: Pilot Converter. Pilot Converter reads pilot files from the original Escape Velocity and converts the data to Escape Velocity:Override pilot files. Now you don't need to make a new pilot if you want to keep playing in the original EV universe using one of the EVC (Escape Velocity Classic)plugins made for use with EVO.

2793.title: ResourceBattler
2793.author: Anonymous
2793.description: A new program for ResEdit users that allows the editing of ship descriptions, names, shipyard pictures, target pictures and comm dialog pictures. Hence, it ALMOST removes all that "Create New Resource" rubbish that takes so much time. Also allows importing of PICT resources from an external resource file (such as another plug in). Create a new ship in ResEdit, do the Spin Resource and animation pictures, and then run the plug in through Resource Battler for the rest. It's not a complete editor...yet. Read the read me file for info on future updates. Cheers!

2800.title: TheDocks102b
2800.author: Anonymous
2800.description: The latest version of the newest ship editor for EV: Override. Version 1.0.2 Beta has a few cosmetic changes, and some additions suggested on the Webboard. Otherwise it is now a full blown ship editor. For those who don't know about it, The Docks enables you to edit all aspects of a ship in EVO. Create new ships, delete them, change their ID and name, alter their pics and sprites. Descriptions and names are editable. All the new EVO 1.0.2 flags are available in a nice clean interface. Auto calculates Sprite sizes. No need to go into ResEdit to use those new features! Import PICTs from other resource forks as well as loading them normally. Create floating Weap ID and Outf ID lists from any file with those resources in them. Download this for all your ship editing needs! 1.0.2 makes the tab order more logical, enabling quick editing. It also adds a few warning messages for Sprite  editing. Cheers!

2461.title: DSPI
2461.author: Anonymous
2461.description: Replacement PICT (333x271) and SpriteMask set for Dark Station where you want to replace the use of the Deep Space Nine image.

2786.title: PlugChecker1.5
2786.author: Anonymous
2786.description:
This is a great little program which you can use to check for errors in your plug-in, and list and find resources within  plug-ins and data files.
Made by DYNA Systems, this version (1.5) was actually written back in 98 but it doesn't seem to exist on the addons pages here, so I'm uploading it now (version 1.16 on the EV addons page doesn't support Override). Apparently there was a 1.5.1 release, so if anyone has it then it would be great if you could upload it here.

2545.title: Government Colours
2545.author: Anonymous
2545.description: Government Colours adds, like in Nova, colours around the systems. I think it helps to make the Override universe more concise (and prettier), because you'll see immediately in which govt you are after you opened the map. This plug is for the Override conversion of EV:Nova and for Mac, so Windows users need to convert it. It should be compatible with every plug which don't change the governments of EV:Override. For bug reports and comments PM me, or mail to hitchhiker@freq245.de More informations can be found in the included Read Me file. By Frequency 245

You must have FOTVE (Fall of the Voinian Empire which can be downloaded from this EVO addons page) and have completed it in order to use this plug-in. This also fixes a few things I thought needed fixing within the original game. Also, keep a look out in the EVNova add-ons page for my next EVNova plug: Star Wars - A New Jedi Order. 2401.description: This is a sneak-peek preview of a plug that changes everything in EVO, very much like B5 or SW2. It has a great plot:  Humanity has found a new enemy: the Nameless. This creatures exist in 7  dimensions, and can be seen only sometimes. They have wiped out the voinans and the crescent, but for some reason, they let humanity fight back, like if they were challenging humans. They destroy earth, for starters... In the middle of this war, you and you spaceship is left crippled and abandoned. Desesperate, you and your crew enter the crio-chambers, and set course for the Valos system. Somewhere along the way, the Navigational computer shuts down, leaving your ship to drift silently without destination... When the crio-chambers wake you up, 10,000 years from now, humanity has won, but the price to survive is beyond your wildest dreams...  A plug which changes everything, new intro, new intro music, new universe, new ships, new weapons, new nebulas, new dudes, new missions, new goverments, and new dangers... 2728.title: VariousEvoTweaks
2728.author: Anonymous
2728.description:
Various little tweaks that I have found improve the EVO playing experience. I expect that functionally similar plugins are available, but perhaps somebody will find these useful. I have no idea if they will be compatible with other EVO plugins. Contains:

Hyper Buster -- makes hyperjumps take less time. I don't like waiting for half an hour to make a cross-galaxy trip, and I think adding extra links is not the solution. This doesn't interfere with the game at all just makes it a little more fun to play.
Hyper UltraBuster -- same as the last, but makes jumps even faster.
FE missions to mission computer -- puts Frontier Express missions on the mission computer. I don't like them coming up in the spaceport bar
Faster Fuel Recharge -- I hate waiting around for fuel scoops to recharge I don't think the delay adds much to the game. This will make them go a little faster.
Hector Payback -- I don't really condone not paying shareware fees, but this adds cheat missions available at Earth so you can get back the money that Captain Hector steals from you. It sucks having to postpone a big purchase because of a Hector theft. Just take off and land and you'll get the money it says.
Small Pictures -- for plugin developers, this may save you ten minutes in editing EVO and EV outfits or making them available in other plugins. I separated out all the little outfit and ship pictures so you can copy them in to other universes' outfitters and shipyards easily.
